name: Delicious
recipe: Squeeze 1.25 oz of cucumber juice and pour it into a shaker
Add 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1.25 oz of apple juice and 0.75 oz of cinnamon syrup
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a slice of cucumber

name: Black Russian
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of coffee liqueur and 2 oz of vodka, then stir gently

name: White Lady
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of triple sec and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled sour glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: El Bizzcoti
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 4 slices of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of homemade honey & ginger syrup, 1 oz of strega and 1.5 oz of mezcal
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Use a clothespin to garnish the cocktail with lemon zest, a green basil leaf and cardamom seeds

name: ABC Frappe
recipe: Fill a champagne saucer with crushed ice, pour in 0.35 oz of absinthe and put it aside
Place 5 green basil leaves into a shaker
Add 1 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Stir absinthe with ice and pour it out of the glass
Finely strain the cocktail into the champagne saucer
Garnish with a green basil leaf and a raspberry

name: Amore Milano
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 1 oz of Campari and 1 oz of Highland single-malt whiskey
Add 3 dashes of homemade milano bitters
Give it a good swizzle
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with lemon zest and a mint sprig

name: Le Jardin de Meme
recipe: Place 3 green basil leaves into a shaker
Add 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 1.5 oz of green chartreuse, 0.5 oz of elderflower liqueur and 0.15 oz of absinthe
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a green basil leaf

name: Four More Years
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of dry orange liqueur, 0.75 oz of dry vermouth and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled goblet glass
Garnish with a leaf of green tea

name: La Vida Pura
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of Maraschino syrup, 1 oz of dry orange liqueur and 2 oz of mezcal into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Foreign Legion
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of manzanilla sherry, 0.5 oz of Aperol, 0.5 oz of Dubonnet, 0.15 oz of dark cacao liqueur and 1.5 oz of aged rum into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of rhubarb bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Above the Clouds
recipe: Place an ice sphere into a rocks glass
Pour 0.35 oz of fig syrup, 0.35 oz of amaro and 2 oz of aged rum into a mixing glass
Add 3 dashes of lavender bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into the rocks glass
Place wood chips with chocolate into a smoking gun
Place the rocks glass under a bell jar and infuse with smoke for a few minutes
Garnish with fig wedges on a cocktail skewer and a lavender sprig

name: Basil Smash
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 10 green basil leaves and a chopped half of lemon into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with green basil leaves

name: Bourbon Renewal
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of creme de cassis and 2 oz of bourbon into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a lemon wheel

name: White Russian
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of light cream, 1 oz of coffee liqueur and 1 oz of vodka into the glass
Stir gently

name: Americano
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of Campari and 1.5 oz of red vermouth
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Bellini
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of peach puree into a mixing glass
Add 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 3.5 oz of champagne
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Finely strain into a small highball glass or flute glass
Top up with champagne

name: Whisky Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of bourbon into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a lemon wheel and a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Gimlet
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime cordial and 2 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with lime zest

name: Brandy Alexander
recipe: Pour 1 oz of light cream, 1 oz of dark cacao liqueur and 1.5 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with ground nutmeg

name: Bronx
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of orange juice, 0.5 oz of red vermouth, 0.5 oz of dry vermouth and 1 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Daiquiri
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Jack Rose
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of grenadine syrup and 2 oz of calvados into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Dry Martini
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of dry vermouth and 2.5 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a green olive on a cocktail skewer

name: Zombie
recipe: Fill a tiki mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of grapefruit juice, 1 oz of cinnamon syrup, 1.5 oz of dark rum and 1 oz of overproof rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the tiki mug
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge and a mint sprig

name: Irish Coffee
recipe: Pour 1.5 oz of heavy cream into a bowl and whisk for a few minutes
Pour 4 oz of hot coffee, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of Irish whiskey into an Irish coffee glass
Stir gently and use bar spoon to layer on heavy cream

name: Caipirinha
recipe: Cube half of a lime, place it into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of cachaca and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice

name: Clover Club
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of raspberry syrup and 2 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a mint leaf

name: Cosmopolitan
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 2 oz of cranberry juice, 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of citrus vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Use a culinary torch to flambée the oils from the orange zest over the cocktail
Rim the sides of the glass with flamed orange zest and put it in the glass

name: Coffee Cocktail
recipe: Pour 5 quail egg yolks, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of tawny port and 1 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with ground nutmeg

name: Bloody Mary
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 4 oz of tomato juice and 1.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Add 3 drops of red Tabasco sauce and 3 drops of Worcestershire sauce
Add a pinch of celery salt and a pinch of ground black pepper
Fill the shaker with ice, close it and roll vertically from one hand to another for a few minutes
Strain into the highball glass and garnish with a celery stalk

name: Blood and Sand
recipe: Pour 1 oz of orange juice, 1 oz of cherry liqueur, 1 oz of red vermouth and 1 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Cuba Libre
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of gold rum
Top up with cola and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels

name: Grasshopper
recipe: Pour 1 oz of light cream, 1 oz of green mint liqueur and 1 oz of white cacao liqueur into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with 2 mint leaves

name: Long Island Iced Tea
recipe: Fill a French press to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of triple sec
Add 1 oz of vodka, 1 oz of gin, 1 oz of white rum and 1 oz of silver tequila
Top up with cola and stir gently

name: Horse’s Neck
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of bourbon and 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with long lemon zest

name: Mai Tai
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of almond syrup, 0.75 oz of dry orange liqueur and 2 oz of aged rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry, a pineapple wedge and a mint sprig

name: Manhattan
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of red vermouth and 1.5 oz of bourbon into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry

name: Margarita
recipe: Rim a margarita glass with salt
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled margarita glass
Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Martinez
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 1 oz of red vermouth and 2 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of orange bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Squeeze orange zest over the glass and put into the cocktail

name: Mimosa
recipe: Pour 3 oz of orange juice into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: French 75
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with lemon zest and a red Maraschino cherry

name: Hurricane
recipe: Fill a hurricane glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 2 oz of orange juice and 2 oz of pineapple juice into a shaker
Add 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 1 oz of dark rum and 1 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice and shake thoroughly
Strain into the hurricane glass
Garnish with a lemon wheel

name: Tom Collins
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the collins glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel and a red Maraschino cherry

name: Stinger
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 1 oz of white mint liqueur and 2 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass

name: Singapore Sling
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 4 oz of pineapple juice, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.5 oz of cherry liqueur, 0.35 oz of triple sec, 0.35 oz of Benedictine and 1 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled sling glass
Garnish with a small pineapple wedge and a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Sazerac
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of absinthe and 0.35 oz of still water, then set aside
Place a sugar cube into a mixing glass
Soak the sugar with 3 dashes of Angostura bitters and 3 dashes of Peychaud's bitters and muddle
Add 1.5 oz of cognac and 1 oz of bourbon
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir until the sugar dissolves
Pour out still water, absinthe and ice from the rocks glass
Strain the cocktail into the aromatized glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Rusty Nail
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of Drambuie and 2 oz of Scotch whisky into the rocks glass and stir

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of light cream, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 0.15 oz of orange flower water
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly again
Strain into a chilled collins glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently

name: Planter's punch
recipe: Fill a hurricane glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of orange juice and 1.5 oz of pineapple juice into a shaker
Add 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 1 dash of Angostura bitters, 0.15 oz of falernum, 0.35 oz of dry orange liqueur, 0.75 oz of white rum and 0.75 oz of dark rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the hurricane glass
Garnish with orange wheel, a pineapple leaf and wedge, a red Maraschino cherry

name: Pisco Punch
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 2 oz of pineapple juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of pisco into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the goblet glass
Garnish with a lime wheel and a red Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Screwdriver
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Old Fashioned
recipe: Place an orange wedge and a red Maraschino cherry into a rocks glass
Add a cane sugar cube soaked in 1 dash of Angostura bitters and muddle
Fill the rocks glass with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of bourbon and stir gently

name: Knickerbocker
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of raspberry syrup, 0.75 oz of dry orange liqueur and 1.5 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Negroni
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of red vermouth and 1 oz of Campari into the glass
Add 1 oz of gin and stir
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Mint Julep
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves and 2 bar spoons of caster sugar into a copper mug
Pour in 0.35 oz of still water and muddle gently
Fill the mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 1.5 oz of aged bourbon and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Mojito
recipe: Place 3 lime wedges into a highball glass and muddle
Take 10 mint leaves and "clap" them between your hands
Place the mint into the highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Add 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Moscow Mule
recipe: Fill a copper mug to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Sidecar
recipe: Rim a cocktail glass with granulated sugar
Pour 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of still water and 0.15 oz of sugar syrup
Add 1 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled cocktail glass

name: Pisco Sour
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of pisco into a shaker
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into a chilled sour glass
Garnish with 3 dashes of Angostura bitters

name: Tom and Jerry
recipe: Whip 1 oz of quail egg white into a bowl until foam forms
Whip separately 5 quail egg yolks with 2 bar spoons of caster sugar
Pour the contents of two bowls into a coffee cup
Add 1 oz of cognac and 1 oz of dark rum
Top up with hot milk and stir gently
Garnish with ground nutmeg

name: Full Bloom
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of cherry blossom liqueur, 0.15 oz of Maraschino liqueur and 1.5 oz of Japanese whiskey into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Manoa
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz of homemade falernum syrup, 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.35 oz of pimento dram liqueur, 1.5 oz of white rum and 1 oz of overproof rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with crushed ice and shake
Pour together with ice into a tiki mug
Garnish with a mint sprig and a lime half with a sugar cube soaked in absinthe
Light the sugar on fire and sprinkle it with ground cinnamon

name: My Sister Daisy
recipe: Gently roll 8 mint leaves between your hands and place them into a shaker
Add 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of orange juice, 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 30 ml of amaro and 1 oz of gin
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with star anise

name: Jackalope
recipe: Fill a cocktail glass with crushed ice and add 0.35 oz of absinthe
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of orange juice, 0.5 oz of maple syrup and 1.5 oz of calvados into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Stir the ice with absinthe, then discard
Strain the cocktail into the cocktail glass

name: Bugsy's Rose
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of lime cordial, 0.5 oz of rose syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a rose petal

name: La Hermosa
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 0.25 oz of almond syrup, 0.5 oz of triple sec, 0.75 oz of manzanilla sherry and 2 oz of white rum
Give it a good swizzle
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and a lemon wedge

name: Old Fashioned № 2
recipe: Place a sugar cube soaked in 3 dashes of Angostura bitters into a rocks glass
Add 0.15 oz of club soda and muddle
Pour in 2 oz of bourbon
Stir until the sugar dissolves
Place some ice cubes into the rocks glass and stir, then add some more ice and stir again
Garnish with lemon and orange zests

name: Raspberry Bramble
recipe: Place 4 raspberries into a collins glass and muddle
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry and 1.5 oz of gin
Add 2 dashes of balsamic vinegar and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a teaspoon and a raspberry, sprinkled with caster sugar

name: Ronald Clayton
recipe: Place an ice cube into a rocks glass
Pour 0.5 oz of homemade tobacco syrup and 2 oz of homemade vanilla whiskey into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of maple bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Finely strain into the rocks glass

name: The 866
recipe: Rim a rocks glass with salt and fill to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of grapefruit juice, 1 oz of Campari and 1 oz of aquavit into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with crushed ice and stir gently
Strain into the rocks glass

name: The Jake Leg
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of homemade sage water, 0.35 oz of ginger syrup and 0.5 oz of homemade pine honey syrup into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of teapot bitters, 0.35 oz of red vermouth and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a sage leaf

name: Charles Sazerac
recipe: Place a cane sugar cube into a rocks glass
Soak it with 1 dash of Angostura bitters and muddle
Pour 0.15 oz of absinthe, 2 oz of bourbon and 1 oz of aged cognac into the rocks glass
Add 5 dashes of Peychaud's bitters
Place an ice cube into the glass and stir gently
Add 0.5 oz of still water
Garnish with orange zest

name: Opium Cocktail №1
recipe: Place a tea sieve with dry ice into a calabash
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 2.5 oz of tangerine juice, 0.75 oz of lime syrup, 1.25 oz of aged rum, 0.5 oz of overproof rum and 0.15 oz of absinthe into a shaker
Add 1 dash of orange bitters
Shake thoroughly
Strain one part of the cocktail into the calabash and place a ginseng capsule in it
Add the other part
Serve in a separate glass with still water and a mate bombilla

name: Rum Steak
recipe: Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes
Pour 0.35 oz of maple syrup, 0.15 oz of absinthe and 2 oz of aged rum into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a slice of jerky with acacia honey

name: Berry Mule
recipe: Fill a copper mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of vodka
Add 6 bar spoons of homemade berry chutney
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with redcurrant, raspberries, blackberries, a fig wedge, cucumber stripes, candied ginger and a mint sprig

name: Manhattan After Dark
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of amaro, 0.5 oz of Lillet Rouge and 1.5 oz of rye whiskey into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Abbott's bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Mr. Priseman's
recipe: Place 6 bar spoons of peach puree into a highball glass
Pour in 0.15 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of oloroso sherry, 0.35 oz of amaro and 1.25 oz of butter-washed bourbon
Fill the highball glass with crushed ice
Give it a good swizzle
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with dried apricots on a cocktail skewer and a cinnamon stick
Serve on a tray with lime zest, a cocktail skewer and cinnamon

name: Ancient Daiquiri
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of vanilla syrup, 0.75 oz of green chartreuse, 0.75 oz of Drambuie and 1.5 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Bankers
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of raspberry syrup, 1 oz of homemade rum mix, 1 oz of LBV port and 1 oz of pure pot still whiskey into a shaker
Add 3 dashes of Dead Rabbit Orinoco bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a pinch of ground nutmeg

name: Border Wars
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of licor 43, 0.5 oz of pear liqueur, 0.35 oz of mezcal and 1.5 oz of bourbon into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a cocktail glass
Add 2 dashes of burdock bitters
Garnish the cocktail with flamed orange peel

name: Box 'o Bones
recipe: Place an ice cube into a champagne saucer decorated with edible gold
Pour 1 oz of white vermouth, 1 oz of dry vermouth, 1 oz of aged tequila and 1 oz of double rye whiskey into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of bergamot bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled glass

name: Carnivore
recipe: Place 7 Sichuan buds and 4 bar spoons of strawberry puree into a blender
Pour in 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of passionfruit juice, 0.75 oz of papaya juice, 0.35 oz of homemade chili vodka and 1.5 oz of pisco
Blend without adding ice for a minute
Pour the cocktail into a bottle and cool it
Fill a cocktail glass with granulated cane sugar and place a carnivorous flower in it
Pour the chilled cocktail into the flower

name: Mr. Uyeda's Gimlet
recipe: Place an ice cube into a champagne saucer
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and make a hard shake
Strain into the champagne saucer

name: Piña Colada
recipe: Cut the pulp of a pineapple with a pineapple slicer and squeeze the juice
Pour 0.75 oz of lime juice, 3.5 oz of the squeezed pineapple juice, 1.5 oz of coconut syrup, 0.5 oz of dark rum and 2 oz of white rum into a blender
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a pineapple

name: Aviation
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.15 oz of violet liqueur and 2 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Zydeco
recipe: Place an ice cube into a rocks glass
Soak a cane sugar cube in 0.75 oz of Amontillado sherry and 2 dashes of Peychaud's bitters in a mixing glass
Add 2 oz of aged cognac
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Tiki Master
recipe: Fill a tiki mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of pineapple juice, 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup, 0.75 oz of yellow banana liqueur, 0.75 oz of Jagermeister and 1.5 oz of aged rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the tiki mug
Garnish with pineapple leaves, banana wheels on a cocktail skewer and powder with ground cinnamon

name: The Fruit Loop
recipe: Place 4 green basil leaves into a shaker
Pour in 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of verbena liqueur, 1.5 oz of genever and 0.5 oz of passionfruit genever
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a green basil leaf, violet flowers and a pinch of caster sugar

name: The 2070 Swizzle
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.25 oz of pimento dram liqueur, 1 oz of overproof rum and 1 oz of aged rum into a tiki mug
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters, 1 dash of pastis and a pinch of ground nutmeg
Fill the glass with crushed ice and give it a good swizzle
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with an orchid

name: Taiwan Tea-ni
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lychee juice, 0.5 oz of machilus honey and 0.5 oz of gin into a teapot
Add 3 dried figs and 1 bar spoon of lotus oolong tea
Pour 2 oz of gin into another teapot and set it on fire
Pour the burning gin into the teapot with other ingredients
Stir gently and close the teapot
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and pour the contents of the teapot into it
Shake thoroughly
Strain the cocktail into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with dried figs

name: Smoking Monkey
recipe: Sprinkle the edges and inner side of a chilled cocktail glass with Islay single- malt whiskey
Pour 0.5 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry and 1.5 oz of homemade banana whiskey into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the aromatized cocktail glass

name: Negroni and Flower
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of chamomile liqueur, 0.75 oz of rhubarb liqueur, 0.75 oz of Campari and 1 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with lemon zest and a chamomile flower

name: The Tower of Power Sour
recipe: Pour 1 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of aged bourbon into a shaker
Add 2 bar spoons of cranberry jam with port
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Finely strain into a sour glass

name: 50 Shades of Oolong
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of grilled lemon juice, 0.5 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of homemade oolong gin into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of lemon bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a cocktail glass
Garnish with a dried tea flower

name: Cross Country
recipe: Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.5 oz of amaro and 1.5 oz of rye whiskey into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Squeeze an orange wedge and garnish the cocktail with it

name: De Ghentsche Moale
recipe: Fill a clay pot with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of orange juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of genever into a shaker
Add 1 bar spoon of Tierenteyn mustard and 0.15 oz of elixir d'Anvers
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled clay pot
Add 0.5 oz of stout and stir gently
Garnish with lemon zest, a sage leaf and pieces of pas de rouge cheese

name: Drunk Uncle
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of white vermouth, 0.75 oz of cynar and 1.5 oz of Islay single-malt whiskey into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with grapefruit zest

name: Jakarta Daiquiri
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 0.15 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.5 oz of white rum and 1.5 oz of Batavia arrack into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cup
Garnish with 2 frozen cherries on a cocktail skewer

name: East Indian Negroni
recipe: Place an ice sphere into a rocks glass
Pour 0.75 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry, 0.75 oz of Campari and 2 oz of white rum into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Lightweight Traveler
recipe: Place an ice sphere into the rocks glass
Place 3 cucumber slices, 5 mint leaves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of aged bourbon
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Top up with ginger beer and gently stir
Garnish with a mint sprig, a cucumber slice and a teaspoon

name: Green Thumb
recipe: Fill a collins glass with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of homemade snap pea syrup, 0.5 oz of green chartreuse, 0.5 oz of Amontillado sherry, 1 oz of aged rum and 1 oz of gin into a shaker
Add a pinch of pink salt
Shake thoroughly
Pour the cocktail into a perlini shaker, gas it and shake thoroughly
Slowly open the perlini shaker in order to remove the surplus gas
Pour into the collins glass
Spray barbecue-flavored tincture over the glass
Garnish with pea tendrils with spices

name: Kir Royale
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of creme de cassis liqueur into a chilled flute glass
Layer on 4 oz of champagne and stir gently

name: Summer Sherry Cobbler
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of raspberry syrup and 2.5 oz of Manzanilla sherry into a shaker
Give it a good dry shake
Strain into the chilled rocks glass
Garnish with a lime wedge, a mint sprig, raspberries, blackberries and ground nutmeg

name: Arnaud’s French 75
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.25 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a long strip of orange zest

name: Zwack and Soda
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of Zwack Unicum into a highball glass
Light up a culinary torch over the cocktail and squeeze oil from 1 lemon zest and 2 orange zests over it
Fill the glass with crushed ice
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with ice
Garnish with a cucumber stripe and a mint sprig

name: Pink Flamingo
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of cherry liqueur, 1 oz of fino sherry and 1 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Antifreeze and Cucumber
recipe: Cut a cucumber in half, and remove the pulp from one half
Pour 1 oz of green mint liqueur and 1 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the shot glass made of cucumber
Drink the shot and chase it with the other cucumber half

name: Mona Lisa
recipe: Pour 2 oz of homemade pepper vodka into a shot glass
Pour 1 oz of sugar syrup into another shot glass and dip a strawberry on a cocktail skewer in it
Drink the shot and chase it with the strawberry

name: Gingerbread
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of honey syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer in the juice from a slice of ginger root, 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 1 oz of vanilla vodka
Garnish with a piece of gingerbread on a cocktail skewer
Drink the shot and chase it with the gingerbread

name: Love Me Do
recipe: Place passionfruit pulp into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1.75 oz of mango juice, 0.35 oz of lychee liqueur, 0.35 oz of limoncello and 1 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with 3 raspberries

name: Tiki Moonshine
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of pineapple puree into a distiller bottle
Pour in 2 oz of white rum and place a cinnamon stick
Light up a culinary torch
Wait 15 minutes until the distillate transfers from the bottle into a shot glass and drink the resulting cocktail

name: Orizaba
recipe: Pour 1 oz of blackberry liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of silver tequila
Carefully add 5 drops of milk using a drinking straw

name: Rum Collins
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a red Maraschino cherry and a lime half

name: Appletini
recipe: Pour 1.5 oz of green apple liqueur, 1 oz of dry vermouth and 0.5 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with 3 apple wedges

name: Cherry-infused Rum
recipe: Fill a 2-quart jar 3/4 of the way with frozen cherries, without pressing them down, and add 7 oz of caster sugar
Top up with white rum
Close the jar and leave it for 2 weeks
The cherry-infused rum is ready when berries begin to float

name: Roman Holiday
recipe: Pour 1 oz of limoncello, 1 oz of fino sherry and 1 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Peach Margarita with Pepper
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 10 bar spoons of peach puree into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 05 oz of agave syrup and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Add a pinch of ground black pepper
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the goblet glass
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Apricot Mulled Wine
recipe: Place 3 bar spoons of apricot jam, a quarter of an orange and lemon zest into a milk pitcher
Pour in 5 oz of dry red wine and 0.75 oz of cognac
Add 3 cloves and a cinnamon stick
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with apricot halves on a cocktail skewer

name: Fountain with Absinthe
recipe: One fountain is prepared for 6 servings of absinthe
Place mint leaves into the absinthe fountain and fill it to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 3 oz of lemon juice and 5 oz of sugar syrup
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Pour 6 oz of absinthe into a goblet glass
Place an absinthe spoon with cane sugar cube onto the goblet glass
Place the goblet glass under the valve and pour 5 oz of the cocktail from the fountain through the sugar cube

name: Absinthe with Pineapple Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of absinthe
Top up with pineapple juice and stir gently

name: Energy Absinthe
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of absinthe
Top up with energy drink and stir gently

name: Absinthe Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of absinthe into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with an absinthe spoon and lemon zest

name: IQ
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with grapefruit juice and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Irish Cream on the Rocks
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 3 oz of Irish cream liqueur
Garnish with a stalk of lemongrass on a cocktail skewer, along with pieces of strawberry, bilberries and blackberry

name: Alco-checkers
recipe: For a fun game, it is recommended to prepare 12 black and white shots for a standard 8 x 8 chessboard
To prepare black shots: pour 14 oz of vodka and 7 oz of coffee liqueur into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into 6 shot glasses
Repeat the process to make another 6 black shots
To prepare white shots: pour 6.5 oz of vodka, 6.5 oz of coffee liqueur and 6.5 oz of light cream into another shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into 6 shot glasses
Repeat the process to make another 6 white shots
Place black and white shots on the chessboard
Start playing!

name: Scarlet Sails
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of rose syrup
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with rose petals

name: Amigo
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of heavy cream and 0.75 oz of silver tequila

name: Whisky and Pineapple Juice
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1.25 oz of pineapple juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with pineapple wedges on a cocktail skewer

name: Pineapple Detox
recipe: Place half of a peeled and chopped pineapple and 1 bar spoon of spirulina powder into a blender
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a sling glass
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: BDSM
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of dark cacao liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Maraschino liqueur
Layer on carefully a mount of whipped cream
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry

name: Angel Tits
recipe: Pour 1 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of Advocaat liqueur
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: English Virgin
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Place the seeds of half of a pomegranate into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.15 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the red wine glass
Garnish with a pomegranate slice

name: The Pianist
recipe: Place 3 raspberries, 2 blackberries, and 1/2 a bar spoon of bilberries into a shaker
Add 3 bar spoons of blackcurrant and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 1 oz of cherry juice and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a sprig of redcurrant

name: English Breakfast
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 4 bar spoons of raspberry jam into a shaker
Pour in 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the red wine glass
Garnish with a top of a lemon with raspberries inside

name: Orange Eggnog
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of orange jam and 0.75 oz of quail egg yolks into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.75 oz of honey, 1.5 oz of light cream, 5 oz of milk and 0.75 oz of dry orange liqueur
Stir while heating with the steam from a coffee machine, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Add a pinch of ground nutmeg and garnish with a cookie

name: Orange Chaser
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Pour 6.5 oz of cinnamon syrup, 26.5 oz of orange juice into a pitcher and stir
Pour gold tequila and chaser into shot glasses
Drink the tequila shot, followed by the chaser shot

name: Arabica
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of grenadine syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of coffee liqueur, 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of silver tequila
Garnish with a strawberry heart
Put the strawberry in your mouth, drink the shot and chase it with the berry

name: Watermelon Margarita
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with crushed ice
Place the pulp of a watermelon wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of pomegranate juice, 0.15 oz of agave syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the goblet glass
Garnish with a quarter of lime

name: Watermelon Cobbler
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Place the pulp of a watermelon wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a piece of watermelon on a cocktail skewer and a mint sprig

name: Watermelon Sling
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place the pulp of a watermelon wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.35 oz of sugar syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a small watermelon wedge

name: Thai Sling
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place the pulp of a watermelon wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of lemongrass syrup and 1.5 oz of citrus vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a small watermelon wedge on a cocktail skewer

name: Watermelon Ale
recipe: Fill a milkshake sundae glass to the top with ice cubes
Place the pulp of a watermelon wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of passionfruit syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the milkshake sundae glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a piece of watermelon on a cocktail skewer

name: B-52
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Irish cream liqueur and 0.5 oz of triple sec
Set on fire, arm yourself with a drinking straw and enjoy!

name: A Beautiful Mind
recipe: Place half a kiwi into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of maple syrup, 1.5 oz of dry white wine and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Add a mint leaf
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Top up carefully with champagne

name: Life of Pi
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 6 red basil leaves into a shaker
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1.25 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of blackberry liqueur and 1.5 oz of gin into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a red basil sprig and a Maraschino cherry

name: Bamboo
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of dry vermouth and 1.5 oz of fino sherry into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Banshee
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of light cream, 0.5 oz of white cacao liqueur and 0.5 oz of yellow banana liqueur into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass

name: Barbie
recipe: Place 2 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 0.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a shot glass
Pour 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup and 0.75 oz of heavy cream into the shaker
Whisk thoroughly
Use a bar spoon to layer on whipped vanilla cream from the shaker
Garnish with a strawberry and sponge cake crumbs
If you are going to prepare many cocktails at once and use more than 0.75 oz of heavy cream, it is more convenient to use a cream whipper

name: Arno
recipe: Pour 1 oz of dry vermouth, 1 oz of peach liqueur and 1 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Rub lemon zest over the rim of the glass, then throw it into the cocktail

name: Sherlock Holmes
recipe: Place 1 slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup, 0.15 oz of Oloroso sherry, 0.75 oz of Campari and 2 oz of butter-washed bourbon
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Bounty
recipe: Place 2 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of coconut syrup, 0.35 oz of vanilla syrup, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.35 oz of triple sec liqueur and 0.75 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry

name: Baja Bocana
recipe: Place 3 sage leaves into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of agave syrup, 0.15 oz of peach liqueur, 0.5 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a sage leaf

name: Bacchus
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of apricot liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of cognac
Garnish with a dried apricot
Drink the shot and chase it with the apricot

name: Amelie
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of homemade wine syrup and 1 oz of cognac into a shaker
Add 3 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel and a mint sprig

name: Beautiful Punch
recipe: A 5-quart punch bowl is enough for about 20–25 portions
Fill a punch bowl 1/3 of the way with ice cubes
Add about 15 red Maraschino cherries and sliced wheels of orange, lemon and lime into the punch bowl
Pour in 7 oz of sugar syrup, 43 oz of dry white wine, 10 oz of peach liqueur and 10 oz of vodka
Top up with club soda and stir gently

name: White Mulled Wine
recipe: Place a quarter of a grapefruit into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.75 oz of honey and 5 oz of dry white wine
Add a cinnamon stick, a vanilla pod and 3 cloves
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass

name: Good Will Hunting
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 12 bar spoons of lychee puree into a shaker
Pour in 1 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of lychee liqueur and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the sling glass
Garnish with a peeled lychee, a raspberry and a pinch of ground black pepper

name: Lemon Mulled Wine
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of honey, 5 oz of dry white wine and 0.75 oz of limoncello into a milk pitcher
Add couple of cardamom seeds and lemon and orange zest
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with a stalk of lemongrass

name: Chamomile Mulled Wine
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of honey and 5 oz of dry white wine into a milk pitcher
Add 1 cinnamon stick, 3 cloves, zest of a lemon quarter and 1 chamomile tea bag
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into an Irish coffee glass

name: American Beauty
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 30 finely chopped and pitted cherries, a cinnamon stick and 1 oz of honey into a milk pitcher
Simmer on low heat until consistency is even
Turn off the heat, add 0.15 oz of amaretto liqueur, a lime leaf and stir gently
Pour 2.5 oz of freshly made cherry syrup, 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of bourbon into the shaker
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime leaf, a bilberry, a blackberry, and a Maraschino cherry

name: Interstellar
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of maple syrup, 0.5 oz of red vermouth and 1.5 oz of dark rum into a shaker
Add a pinch of saffron and 5 dashes of peach bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: B-black
recipe: Pour 2 oz of dark rum into a shot glass
Sprinkle an orange wedge with ground cinnamon
Drink the shot and chase it with the spiced orange to get the full sensation

name: Groundhog Day
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of blackcurrant syrup into a chilled sling glass
Place 3 bar spoons of cowberry in the glass and add 0.25 oz of lime juice
Use a bar spoon to top up with light beer

name: The Green Mile
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of melon liqueur
Top up with bitter lemon and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice and garnish with lemon zest

name: Blink Blink
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of raspberry liqueur and 0.35 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass
Top up with champagne
Garnish with a raspberry on a cocktail skewer
Drink the shot and chase it with the raspberry

name: Blow Job
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of Irish cream liqueur and 0.75 oz of amaretto liqueur into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass
Layer on whipped cream
Drink the shot without using your hands

name: Blackwood
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of balsamic cream, 1.25 oz of orange juice, 0.5 oz of cinnamon syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the red wine glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with orange zest

name: Black Sabbath
recipe: Place 4 blackberriesa and the pulp from a quarter of one passionfruit into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of passionfruit syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky, then stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a blackberry and a red rose petal on a cocktail skewer

name: Bohemian
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 3.5 oz of cooled earl grey tea, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.75 oz of peach liqueur and 1 oz of Becherovka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges on a cocktail skewer sprinkled with cinnamon

name: Roger Rabbit
recipe: Place 4 blackberries, 3 strawberries and 6 raspberries into a blender
Pour in 0.75 oz of honey and 5 oz of cranberry juice
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a milkshake sundae glass

name: Boca Chica
recipe: Place 6 bar spoons of coconut cream and half of a peeled guava into a blender
Pour in 15 ml of lime juice, 10 ml of yellow banana syrup, 10 ml of passionfruit syrup, 20 ml of melon liqueur and 60 ml of vodka
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a hurricane glass
Garnish with a pineapple wedge, a pineapple leaf, a Maraschino cherry and a cocktail umbrella

name: Big Apple
recipe: Place a slice of a ginger root and a cinnamon stick into a milk pitcher
Pour in 1.5 oz of calvados and 5 oz of apple juice
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Strain into a cup
Place the cinnamon from the milk pitcher into the cup
Serve with a tartlet, containing a green apple wedge, dried apricots and dried plum covered in honey

name: The Notebook
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of blackberry liqueur into a chilled cocktail glass
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 1 oz of yellow apple syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Use a bar spoon to strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges on a rosemary sprig

name: Fighter
recipe: Pour 2 oz of gold tequila into a shot glass
Place a cucumber slice sprinkled with salt into another shot glass
Drink the tequila and chase it with the cucumber

name: Greyhound
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of grapefruit juice, 1 oz of grapefruit liqueur and 0.75 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass
Drink the shot and chase it with a grapefruit wedge

name: Boston Tea
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur, 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur, 0.75 oz of vodka, 0.75 oz of gin, 0.75 oz of silver tequila and 0.75 oz of white rum
Top up with cola and stir gently

name: Barrel with Honey
recipe: Rim a shot glass with honey
Pour in 15 ml of honey
Use a bar spoon to layer on 15 ml of green apple liqueur
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon
Layer on 15 ml of lemon juice and 15 ml of Scotch whisky
Lick the honey rim and drink the cocktail

name: Chuck Norris
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of vodka
Add 4-5 drops of red Tabasco sauce

name: Brandy Buck
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of dry orange liqueur and 1.5 oz of cognac
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Léon: the Professional
recipe: Rim a red wine glass with sugar
Pour 0.15 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.5 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of cognac into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and 1 dash of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled red wine glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Brandy Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of quail egg whites, 0.75 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a lemon wheel and a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Breathing Bali
recipe: Place a chopped lemongrass stalk and 7 raspberries into a shaker, then muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vanilla vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a raspberry and a slice of lemongrass

name: The Sixth Sense
recipe: Place 1 large slice of ginger root into a highball glass and muddle
Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of honey syrup, 1 oz of lemongrass syrup and 1.5 oz of raspberry vodka
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a pineapple leaf and a raspberry rubbed in sugar inside a lime half

name: The Broker
recipe: Pour 2 oz of citrus vodka into a shot glass
Pour 0.5 oz of honey into another shot glass and add a pinch of salt
Dip a peeled grapefruit wedge on a cocktail skewer into the shot glass with honey and salt
Drink the shot and chase it with the grapefruit

name: Little Red Riding Hood
recipe: Place 9 bar spoons of cowberries and 3 orange wedges into a highball glass
Top up with hot jasmine tea
Let it infuse and serve with a bar spoon

name: Shots from Tambourine
recipe: A tambourine fits about 10-12 shot glasses
Pour 1.5 oz of lime juice, 3.5 oz of watermelon juice, 1.75 oz sugar syrup and 3.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the shot glasses
Place the shot glasses into the tambourine and serve

name: Bubblegum
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of light cream, 0.5 oz of amaretto liqueur and 0.5 oz of green banana liqueur into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass

name: Secret Fizz
recipe: Place 2 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of raspberry syrup, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup and 0.35 oz of Benedictine
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently

name: Boom Box
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of plum wine into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of hot Americano coffee and 0.5 oz of vodka

name: Orange-infused Bourbon
recipe: Place 4 oranges into a 2-quart jar
Add 20 cloves, 4 cinnamon sticks and 0.35 oz of granulated sugar
Top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Cowberry-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar with cowberries without tamping
Add 0.35 oz of granulated sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Cherry-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar 3/4 of the way with frozen cherries, without tamping
Add 0.75 oz of caster sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 1 week
The infusion is ready when cherries begin to float

name: Strawberry-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar with strawberries without tamping
Add 0.35 oz of granulated sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Cranberry-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar to the top with cranberries, without tamping
Add 0.35 oz of granulated sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Apricot-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar with dried apricots, without tamping
Add 0.35 oz of granulated sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Raspberry-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar to the top with raspberries without tamping
Add 0.35 oz of granulated sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Sea buckthorn-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar with sea buckthorn without tamping
Add 10 oz of granulated sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Plum-infused Bourbon
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar with dried plums, without tamping
Add 0.35 oz of granulated sugar and top up with bourbon
Close the jar and infuse for 4 days in a warm, dark place

name: Bucharest
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of passionfruit syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Campari and 0.5 oz of white rum

name: Bianco Orange
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of white vermouth
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Bianco Bitter Lemon
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of white vermouth
Top up with bitter lemon and stir gently
Garnish with grapefruit zest

name: Bianco Breeze
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of grapefruit juice and 1.5 oz of white vermouth
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Vanilla Sky
recipe: Chop a quarter of a lemon and place it into a rocks glass
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of apple juice and 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup
Add 2 oz of white vermouth and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Bianco on the Rocks
recipe: Squeeze 2 lemon wedges and place them into a rocks glass
Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 3.5 oz of white vermouth and stir gently

name: Hachiko
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2.5 oz of orange juice and 1.5 oz of white vermouth
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with 2 orange wedges

name: Bianco and Tonic
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of white vermouth
Top up with tonic and stir gently
Garnish with two lemon wedges

name: Agua de Valencia
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Place 3 Maraschino cherries into a pitcher
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of sugar syrup, 7 oz of orange juice, 2 oz of triple sec, and 2 oz of gin
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and an orange wedge

name: Vanilla Ice
recipe: Place 2 small lime wedges and 6 red grapes into a rocks glass, then muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of vanilla syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka, then stir gently
Garnish with a half of a red grape on a cocktail skewer

name: Vanilla Kick
recipe: Place a quarter of lemon into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with jellies

name: Vanilla Collins
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of lemongrass syrup and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with lemon wedges

name: Vanilla smash
recipe: Place 30 mint leaves into a highball glass and muddle gently
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of yellow apple syrup and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a green apple slice and a mint sprig

name: K-Pax
recipe: Pour 2 oz of vanilla vodka into a shot glass
Garnish with a lime wedge sprinkled with ground cinnamon on one side and with granulated sugar on the other
Drink the shot and chase it with the lime

name: Vanilla Breeze
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of cranberry juice and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Top up with grapefruit juice and stir gently
Garnish with a chopped grapefruit

name: Back to the Future
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of green apple liqueur, 0.35 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of vanilla vodka
Garnish with an apple slice with cinnamon
Drink the shot and chase it with the apple

name: Bubble Bath
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lychee liqueur, 1 oz of homemade poppyseed vodka and 1 oz of homemade lavender vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Place 8 peeled and pitted lychees into a juicer and make fresh lychee juice
Pour 2 oz of still water, 4 oz of lychee juice and 0.25 oz of rose syrup into a bowl
Add a pinch of lecithin
Whisk until foam appears
Garnish the cocktail with the resulting foam

name: The Great Wall
recipe: Pour 2 oz of orange vodka into a shot glass
Pour 1 oz of blackcurrant syrup into another shot glass
Dip a peeled tangerine wedge on a cocktail skewer in it
Drink the shot and chase it with the tangerine

name: Corduroy Daiquiri
recipe: Place 4 blackberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gold rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a lime wheel and a blackberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Heather Tea
recipe: Chop a quarter of orange, a grapefruit wedge and an apple wedge into fine pieces
Place the fruit into an Irish coffee glass
Pour in 0.5 oz of grenadine syrup, 1 oz of Drambuie and 1 oz of Benedictine
Add 3 cloves and a pinch of ground nutmeg
Top up with hot heather tea and stir gently
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges

name: Vesper
recipe: Pour 0.25 oz of lillet blanc, 0.5 oz of vodka and 1.5 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Rub lemon zest over the rim of the glass and garnish the cocktail with it

name: Beethoven
recipe: Pour 5 oz of cherry juice into a milk pitcher and heat
Place 15 pomegranate seeds into a mixing glass and muddle
Add 1 bar spoon of black tea leaves and 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Pour 1 oz of spiced rum into 5 oz of hot cherry juice and stir gently
Finely strain into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with a green apple wedge, a raspberry and a blackberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Evergreen Fizz
recipe: Pour 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of blue curacao liqueur, 0.75 oz of melon liqueur and 2 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 1/2 bar spoon of caster sugar
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Pour with ice into a milkshake sundae glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lemon wedges

name: Grape Mojito
recipe: Place 5 green grapes cut in half and 10 mint leaves into a sling glass
Add 2 bar spoons of granulated sugar and muddle
Fill the sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with green grapes and a mint sprig

name: Whisky Cola
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Top up with cola and stir gently

name: Seven
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 1.5 oz of orange juice, 1 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the red wine glass
Garnish with an orange wedge and walnuts dipped in honey

name: Whisky on the Rocks
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of Scotch whisky

name: Mint Clan
recipe: Place 7 mint leaves into a rocks glass
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of peach iced tea
Add 2 oz of Scotch whisky and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with two peach wedges

name: Obsession
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Top up with cherry juice and stir gently
Garnish with a lemon wheel and a red Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Whisky Collins
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a half of lemon

name: Whiskey and Apple Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of Irish whiskey
Top up with apple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a fan of apple wedges sprinkled with ground cinnamon

name: Vitamin G
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of honey syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of vodka
Garnish with a piece of honey-covered radish
Drink the shot and chase it with the radish

name: Vitamin Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place a quarter of peeled and sliced mango into a blender
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 5 oz of orange juice and 2 oz of passionfruit syrup
Blend without adding ice and pour into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with cucumber wheels

name: Cherry Beer
recipe: Pour 0.25 oz of lemon juice, 2.5 oz of cherry juice, 0.75 oz of cherry syrup and 2.5 oz of dark beer into a milk pitcher
Add lemon and orange zests, a cinnamon stick and 5 cloves
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Let chill for 1.5 minutes and pour into an Irish coffee glass

name: Cherry Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of cherry juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with an orange wedge and a Maraschino cherry

name: Cohiba
recipe: Pour 1 oz of cherry juice, 1 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry and 1 oz of bourbon into a rocks glass
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest and a cinnamon stick

name: Vaudeville
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of almond syrup, 1 oz of cinnamon liqueur and 1 oz of absinthe into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the collins glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wheel on a cocktail skewer

name: Interstate 60
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Top up with bitter lemon and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Dictator
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with lime and lemon wedges

name: Snatch
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Top up with apple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a vanilla pod

name: Vodka with Pomegranate Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with pomegranate juice and stir gently
Garnish with a small pomegranate wedge

name: Rapunzel
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of pear vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with pear wedges

name: Vodka with Tangerine Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with tangerine juice and stir gently
Garnish with 2 tangerine wedges

name: Vodka Martini
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of dry vermouth and 2.5 oz of vodka into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with 3 green olives on a cocktail skewer

name: Vodka with Mint Tea
recipe: Place 15 mint leaves into a highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with green iced tea and stir gently
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Vodka on the Rocks
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of vodka
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Vodka Smash
recipe: Place 15 mint leaves, a half of lime into a highball glass and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Vodka with Sprite
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wedges

name: Vodka and Tonic
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with tonic and stir gently
Garnish with a lemon wedge

name: Energy Vodka
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with energy drink and stir gently
Garnish with a lemon wedge

name: Mini Me
recipe: Pour equal parts of vodka and energy drink into a shot glass

name: East Meets West
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Place seeds from half a pomegranate and 10 mint leaves into a mixing glass and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup and 2 oz of bourbon
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with mint leaves and a small pomegranate wedge
Use a julep strainer to make the cocktail easier to drink

name: Eastern Tea Party
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 4 red basil leaves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 1.5 oz of apple juice, 2 oz of cranberry juice, 0.25 oz of cinnamon liqueur and 1.25 oz of orange vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a sling glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a red basil leaf and a cinnamon stick

name: Eastern Honey
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of orange vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with an orange wheel and the pulp of half a passionfruit

name: Orient Express
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of vanilla syrup, 0.35 oz of cinnamon liqueur and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange wedges and a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: All Fall Down
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of cinnamon liqueur and 0.5 oz of overproof rum

name: Woo Woo
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of cranberry juice, 0.5 oz of peach liqueur and 0.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass

name: Galileo
recipe: Fill a rocks glass halfway with ice cubes
Pour in 0.75 oz of red vermouth and 0.75 oz of Campari
Place a lemon wheel
Pour 0.75 oz of silver tequila and 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur into a shot glass
Set the shot on fire and let it burn a little bit
Pour hot cocktail into the rocks glass and stir gently

name: Galliano Hot Shot
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of galliano into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of hot espresso and 0.35 oz of heavy cream

name: Garibaldi
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of Campari
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Henrietta Hudson
recipe: Pour 1 oz of white vermouth, 1 oz of elderflower liqueur, 1 oz of calvados and 1 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest on a cocktail skewer

name: Simple Mulled Wine
recipe: Pour 5 oz of dry red wine into a milk pitcher
Add 2 bar spoons of granulated sugar, 1 cinnamon stick, 3 cloves, and lemon and orange zests
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass

name: French Mulled Wine
recipe: Place a chopped apple wedge and a large strawberry into a milk pitcher
Add 2 stripes of orange zest and one piece of star anise, one clove and one cinnamon stick
Pour in 1.75 oz of apple juice, 1.75 oz of honey syrup, 1.75 oz of tawny port and 7 oz of dry red wine
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a teapot
Serve on a base with a candle to prevent the cocktail from cooling, with star anise to enhance the fragrance

name: Cardinal Mulled Wine
recipe: Place a chopped apple wedge and 8 bar spoons of blackcurrant jam into a milk pitcher
Add two stripes of orange zest, star anise, a cinnamon stick and a clove
Pour in 1.75 oz of apple juice, 7 oz of dry red wine and 0.75 oz of cognac
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a teapot
Serve on a base with a candle to prevent the cocktail from cooling

name: Rosemary Mulled Wine
recipe: Place chopped zest of a tangerine half into a milk pitcher and muddle
Add the pulp of a tangerine half and muddle
Pour in 5 oz of dry red wine
Add 0.35 oz of honey, lemon zest, two rosemary sprigs, a cinnamon stick and 3 cloves
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with a tangerine wheel and a sprig of rosemary

name: Deep bombshell
recipe: Fill a highball glass 2/3 of the way with light beer
Pour 0.5 oz of green mint liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of passionfruit liqueur and 0.5 oz of triple sec
Set the shot on fire and put it into the highball with light beer

name: Eggnog
recipe: Mix 5 quail egg yolks and 0.75 oz of honey in a milk pitcher
Pour in 1.75 oz of light cream and 5 oz of milk
Heat the cocktail with the steam from a coffee machine, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Add a pinch of ground nutmeg and garnish with cookie

name: Golden Collins
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 5 egg quail egg yolks into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Goldinez
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry, 0.35 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.35 oz of Scotch whisky and 2 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with an orange wedge and a red Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Dutch Courage
recipe: Place 1 bar spoon of caster sugar into a copper mug
Top up with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of genever
Add 3 dashes of clove bitters
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Dutch Basil Smash
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 5 red basil leaves, 2 grapefruit wedges into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of grapefruit liqueur and 1.5 oz of genever
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with red basil leaves

name: Blue Lagoon
recipe: Fill a hurricane glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.75 oz of blue curacao and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a pineapple wedge

name: Thor
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 7 blackberries and 9 bar spoons of bilberries into a shaker, then muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of blackberry liqueur and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the goblet glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with blackberries, bilberries, and a sprig of mint

name: Clouds in the Sky
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 3 slices of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of carrot juice, 1.25 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of maple syrup and 2 oz of gold rum
Add 5 cloves
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Garnish with a slice of ginger root and a cinnamon stick

name: Bitter Pill
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of passionfruit syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Campari and 0.5 oz of vodka

name: Hot Gold
recipe: Place an orange wheel, 3 bar spoons of vanilla granulated sugar, a cinnamon stick, 5 cloves and a pinch of ground nutmeg into a milk pitcher
Pour in 16 oz of orange juice, 2 oz of amaretto and 2 oz of cognac
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a french press together with orange and spices

name: Hot Apple
recipe: Place star anise into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.15 oz of lime juice, 5 oz of apple juice and 1.5 oz of Drambuie
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Strain into a cup
Garnish with the star anise
Serve with a tartlet filled with dried apricots, dried plum and an apple wedge, covered in honey

name: Halle Berry
recipe: Place 10 bar spoons of strawberry puree into a milk pitcher
Add 1 oz of strawberry syrup, 3.5 oz of orange juice and 1.5 oz of white rum
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
