Garnish with a chopped strawberry

name: Hot and Spicy
recipe: Place a finely-chopped chili pepper into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 3.5 oz of still water
Stir while heating and bring to a boil
Let it cool and repeat the process 2-3 times
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of ginger root juice, 0.35 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of cognac into the milk pitcher
Add 2 cloves and stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour through a sieve into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with a slice of ginger root pierced with a chili pepper

name: Hot Buttered Rum
recipe: Place 0.35 oz of honey, 2 bar spoons of salted butter, and a pinch of ground cinnamon into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of dark rum
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and serve with a lime half with cookies

name: Hot Rum Punch
recipe: Place 2 cloves into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 4 oz of black tea, 0.75 oz of honey syrup, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 1.5 oz of tawny port and 1.5 oz of dark rum
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into a goblet glass
Garnish with a cinnamon stick wrapped in orange zest

name: Hot Toddy
recipe: Place a lemon, a lime, and an orange wedge into a milk pitcher and muddle
Add star anise, a cinnamon stick, a clove and a pinch of ground nutmeg
Pour in 0.35 oz of grenadine syrup and 5 oz of boiling water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Filter into a heated cup
Place the cinnamon from the milk pitcher into the cup
Serve with a tartlet filled with dried plum, dried apricots and an apple wedge, all covered in honey

name: Burning Henry
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of amaretto into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Irish cream and 0.5 oz of bourbon
Set the shot on fire and drink quickly through a straw

name: Burning Dr. Pepper
recipe: Fill a highball glass 2/3 of the way with light beer
Pour 1 oz of amaretto liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of overproof rum
Set the shot on fire and put it into the highball glass with beer

name: Burning Ferrari
recipe: Pour 2 oz of triple sec liqueur into a shot glass
Pour 2 oz of dark rum into another shot glass
Pour 0.5 oz of grenadine syrup into a cocktail glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of blue curacao and 0.75 oz of overproof rum '
Set rum on fire in the cocktail glass and begin to drink quickly through a straw
As you drink the cocktail, gradually pour the dark rum and triple sec liqueur from the shot glasses into the cocktail glass

name: Pomegranate Margarita
recipe: Rim a champagne saucer with a mix of salt and granulated sugar
Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of pomegranate juice, 0.15 oz of agave syrup, 0.5 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled glass

name: Pomegranate Tini
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of pomegranate juice and 2 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Grand Mimosa
recipe: Pour 1 oz of orange juice and 0.35 oz of dry orange liqueur into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Grand Sazerac
recipe: Spray inside and outside of a сollins glass with absinthe
Fill the сollins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.75 oz of dry orange liqueur and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Duke
recipe: Place 8 pitted cherries into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.75 oz of Campari and 0.75 oz of dry orange liqueur
Add 0.75 oz of gin and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Zero
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 1.5 oz of grapefruit liqueur, 0.75 oz of gin and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Grapefruit Whisky Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with an orange wedge

name: Grapefruit Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of ginger root juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 1 oz of green apple syrup, 1 oz of honey syrup and 8 oz of grapefruit juice into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Filter into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wheel

name: Rattlesnake
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of dark cacao liqueur, 0.5 oz of coffee liqueur and 0.5 oz of Irish cream into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass
Garnish with ground coffee

name: The Fruit is Ripe
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of passionfruit liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of cognac
Garnish with a fig wedge covered with honey
Drink the shot and chase it with a fig

name: Sorrel Tini
recipe: Place 8 sorrel leaves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 1 oz of pineapple juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a sorrel leaf

name: Just Grog
recipe: Place 2 lemon wedges, 3 cloves and 3 cardamom seeds into an Irish coffee glass
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with hot black tea and stir gently

name: Good Time Girl
recipe: Place 5 oz of vanilla ice cream, a peeled mango wedge and the pulp of 1 passion fruit into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.75 oz of mango liqueur and 2 oz of vodka
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a sling glass
Garnish with physalis and a carambola wedge

name: Cherry Daiquiri
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of cherry jam into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of homemade vanilla rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Pomegranate Daiquiri
recipe: Place the seeds of a pomegranate wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.15 oz of limoncello and 1 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with half a lime wheel

name: Mexican Daiquiri
recipe: Place a quarter of peeled and chopped avocado into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of agave syrup and 2 oz of gold rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a pineapple leaf

name: Raspberry Daiquiri
recipe: Place 6 raspberries into a blender
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of white rum
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a rocks glass
Garnish with a lime wheel and a raspberry

name: Grapefruit Daiquiri
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Basil Daiquiri
recipe: Place 6 leaves of red basil into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with red basil leaves

name: Ginger Toddy
recipe: Place a chopped half of orange wheel and a chopped lime quarter into an Irish coffee glass
Add a small pinch of ground nutmeg and one clove
Pour in 0.5 oz of ginger syrup and 1.5 oz of dark rum
Top up with hot earl grey tea and stir gently
Garnish with a big slice of a ginger root with burnt cane sugar

name: Double Pleasure
recipe: Place 4 strawberries into a blender
Pour in 1.75 oz of peach juice, 0.5 oz spiced syrup and 1.5 oz of homemade pepper vodka
Add a scoop of crushed ice into the blender and blend
Pour into a chilled margarita glass
Garnish with a chili pepper and half of a strawberry

name: Day and Night
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Place a half of finely chopped lemongrass stalk, 5 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of cinnamon syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a highball glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a stalk of lemongrass and half of a strawberry

name: Jackie
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of homemade honey & ginger syrup and 2 oz of bourbon into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Squeeze lemon zest over the cocktail, rub it on the rim of the glass, and add to the cocktail

name: Jimmy Jimmy
recipe: Rim a sour glass with vanilla granulated sugar
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur, 0.75 oz of blackcurrant vodka and 0.75 oz of vanilla vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled sour glass

name: Gin and Bitter Lemon
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of gin
Top up with bitter lemon and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Inception
recipe: Pour 1 oz of dry vermouth, 1 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry and 1 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir until frost appears on the sides
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Home Alone
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 3 cucumber wheels into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into ahe highball glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with three cucumber stripes

name: Gin and Cranberry Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of gin
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Gin Mule
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 slices of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wheel and a slice of ginger root

name: Red currant-infused Gin
recipe: Place grated zest of a whole lemon into a 2-quart jar
Fill the jar 3/4 of the way with redcurrants without tamping
Add 10 oz of caster sugar and top up with gin
Close the jar and infuse for 2-3 weeks
The infusion is ready when berries begin to float

name: Raspberry-infused Gin
recipe: Place grated zest of a whole lime into a 2-quart jar
Fill the jar 3/4 of the way with frozen raspberries without tamping
Add 7 oz of caster sugar and top up with gin
Close the jar and leave in a dark place for 1.5 weeks
The infusion is ready when berries begin to float
Do not open the jar before the preparation process

name: Blackcurrant-infused Gin
recipe: Place grated zest of a whole lemon into a 2-quart jar
Fill the jar 3/4 of the way with blackcurrants without tamping
Add 10 oz of caster sugar and top up with gin
Close the jar and infuse for 2-3 weeks
The infusion is ready when the berries begin to float

name: Gin with Peach Tea
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Top up with peach iced tea and stir gently
Garnish with a quarter of a lemon

name: Gin and Tonic
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of gin
Top up with tonic and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels

name: Gin and Tonic with Cucumber
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of gin
Top up with tonic and stir gently
Garnish with a half of cucumber

name: Ju Julep
recipe: Place 20 mint leaves into a copper mug
Fill the mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of rose syrup and 0.75 oz of peach liqueur
Add 1.4 oz of cognac and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Spray a little bit of rose water over the cocktail
Garnish with a rose petal and a mint sprig

name: Pretty Woman
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 6 mint leaves into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.5 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the goblet glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge and a mint sprig

name: Jam Jackpot
recipe: Place 1 bar spoon of fig jam, 6 bar spoons of raspberry puree and 6 bar spoons of strawberry puree into a shaker
Add 1.5 oz of bourbon and 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a jar

name: Gandhi
recipe: Place a pineapple wheel and 3 strawberries into a blender
Pour in 2 oz of coconut syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a sling glass
Garnish with a chopped strawberry and a pear wedge

name: Jurassic Park
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of ginger syrup, 0.5 oz of falernum liqueur, 1 oz of Amontillado sherry and 1 oz of gold tequila
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Stir with a swizzle stick
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Home Lebowski
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of chilled espresso coffee, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Stir until the sides of the glass begin to frost
Use a bar spoon to layer on heavy cream
Garnish with ground nutmeg

name: Homemade Marmalade
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 orange and 2 pineapple wedges into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the red wine glass
Garnish with a chopped pineapple wedge and a pineapple leaf

name: Hawking Territory
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 5 bar spoons of cherry jam into a blender
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of grapefruit juice and 4 oz of white rum
Blend and pour into the highball glass
Garnish with a lime half with cherry jam

name: Hat Trick
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of pineapple juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Carefully add 0.35 oz of cherry juice
Garnish with a pineapple wheel

name: Steven Seagal
recipe: Pour 1 oz of grenadine syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of Sambuca
Add 4-5 drops of red Tabasco sauce

name: Ghost
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.15 oz of lychee liqueur, 0.5 oz of limoncello and 1 oz of gold rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Blend 4 bar spoons of cranberry and pour the resulting puree into a bowl
Add 1 oz of quail egg white and 1 bar spoon of vanilla granulated sugar
Whisk until foam forms
Garnish the cocktail with the resulting cranberry foam
Sprinkle with vanilla granulated sugar and pass the flame over it several times, so that the sugar caramelizes

name: The Spirit of '57
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1.25 oz of orange juice, 0.5 oz of mandarin liqueur and 1.25 oz of vodka into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of peach bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with wedges of carambola and dragonfruit, orange zest and a pineapple leaf on a cocktail skewer

name: Soulful Punch
recipe: One punch bowl is enough for about 20 rocks glasses
Place 3 chopped canned pineapple wheels and 20 strawberries into a punch bowl
Add a chopped half of orange, lime, 100 ml of white rum and let it infuse
Fill the punch bowl 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Pour in 5 oz of homemade brandied cherry syrup, 17 oz of cranberry juice, 33.5 oz of sprite, 23.5 oz of plum wine and 23.5 oz of white rum
Stir gently, pour into the rocks glass and garnish with a strawberry and a mint sprig

name: Cigarette
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of vanilla syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with chilled lapsang souchong and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Rim the glass with orange zest and garnish the cocktail with it

name: Smoked Mulled Wine
recipe: Pour 1.5 oz of lapsang souchong, 0.75 oz of cherry syrup and 4 oz of tawny port into a milk pitcher
Add 0.35 oz of honey, a pinch of ground cinnamon and 3 cloves
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with two green apple wedges

name: Creamy Flip
recipe: Pour 5 quail egg yolks, 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled flute glass
Garnish with a cookie and ground cinnamon

name: Smoky Scot
recipe: Place a quarter of orange, a sprig of thyme into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of vanilla syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a thyme sprig

name: Baked Apple
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with apple peel

name: Melon Bellini
recipe: Place the pulp from 3 melon pieces into a mixing glass and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 5 oz of champagne
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and stir
Finely strain into a chilled flute glass
Garnish with a melon slice

name: Duke Tulip
recipe: Place a quarter of lemon, 2 orange wedges, a rosemary sprig into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of vanilla syrup and 1.5 oz of gold tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with 2 raspberries on a rosemary sprig

name: Blackberry Mood
recipe: Place a quarter of peeled and chopped pineapple and 3 blackberries into a rocks glass
Pour in 0.35 oz of blackberry syrup, 1 oz of coconut liqueur and 1 oz of white rum into a rocks glass
Add a scoop of crushed ice
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently

name: Blackberry Milkshake
recipe: Place 6 blackberries and 7 oz of blackberry ice cream into a milkshake mixer
Add 3 oz of milk
Mix without adding ice and pour into a milkshake sundae glass
Garnish with a blackberry

name: Blackberry Tea
recipe: Place 5 blackberries and 1/2 a bar spoon of granulated cane sugar into a milk pitcher and muddle
Add 1 oz of honey, a clove and a cinnamon stick broken in halves
Pour in 2 oz of cranberry juice and 4 oz of still water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour through a sieve into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with lemon zest and 2 blackberries on cocktail skewers

name: Yellow Mix
recipe: Pour 1.75 oz of apple juice, 1 oz of plum wine, 1 oz of rose vermouth and 0.75 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Liquid Cheesecake
recipe: Place 1 bar spoon of mascarpone cheese and lemon zest into a shaker
Pour in 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.35 oz of vanilla syrup, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with grated dark chocolate

name: Life is Beautiful
recipe: Place a cane sugar cube into a chilled flute glass
Pour 0.25 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.75 oz of Campari and 0.75 oz of calvados into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the flute glass
Carefully top up with champagne
Squeeze grapefruit zest over the flute glass and use it to garnish the cocktail

name: Breakfast
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to add a quail egg yolk and layer on 0.5 oz of vodka

name: Russian Breakfast
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of cognac
Gently put the quail egg yolk into the shot

name: Breakfast with Tequila
recipe: Place 1 bar spoon of orange jam into a shaker
Pour in 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of grapefruit juice and 0.75 oz of gold tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled flute glass
Garnish with 2 dashes of Angostura bitters

name: Forbidden Fruit
recipe: Place 2 blackberries into a mixing glass and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of lavender syrup and 1.5 oz of calvados
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Berry Tea
recipe: Place 12 bar spoons of strawberry puree and 6 bar spoons of raspberry puree into an Irish coffee glass
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of honey syrup
Top up with boiling water and stir gently

name: French Collins
recipe: Place 6 green grapes and 10 red basil leaves into a highball glass
Add a chopped lime half and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of cognac
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a sprig of red basil

name: Green Fairy
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of blue curacao liqueur, 1 oz of melon liqueur, 0.5 oz of white rum, 0.5 oz of vodka, 0.5 oz of silver tequila and 0.5 oz of absinthe
Top up with energy drink and stir gently
Garnish with 2 Maraschino cherries on a cocktail skewer and lemon zest

name: Neo Punch
recipe: A 5-quart punch bowl is enough for about 20-25 portions
Fill a punch bowl 1/3 of the way with ice cubes
Pour in 20 oz of lemon juice, 5 oz of blue curacao, 15 oz of melon liqueur, 7 oz of white rum, 7 oz of vodka, 7 oz of silver tequila and 7 oz of absinthe
Top up with energy drink and gently stir

name: Green Ray
recipe: Pour 1 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of green chartreuse

name: Surprise
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 3 bar spoons of bilberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of creme de cassis liqueur, 0.35 oz of blueberry liqueur and 1 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a rosemary sprig

name: Frozen Bavaria
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of caramel syrup, 1.25 oz of green apple syrup and 2 oz of light beer into a blender
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with apple slices and serve with a teaspoon

name: Winter Cherry
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of heavy cream, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of cherry juice and 2 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the glass
Top up with club soda
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Frozen Physalis
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 1.5 oz of passionfruit syrup and 3 oz of light beer into a blender
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a physalis and serve with a teaspoon

name: Golden Margarita
recipe: Rim a margarita glass with a mix of salt and granulated cane sugar
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of triple sec and 1.5 oz of gold tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled margarita glass
Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Golden Tequila Boom-Boom
recipe: Pour 2 oz of gold tequila into a rocks glass and sprite almost to the top
Put a napkin on the the rocks glass, cover with hand and hit the glass 3 times on the table quickly and heavily
Drink quickly while it foams!

name: Golden Tequila with Lime and Salt
recipe: Pour in 2 oz of gold tequila into a shot glass
Wet your hand with a lime wedge between middle and index fingers
Sprinkle this spot with salt
Lick the salt, drink the shot and chase it with the lime

name: Bonanza
recipe: Pour 2 oz of gold tequila into a shot glass
Pour 0.35 oz of honey into another shot glass
Add 3 drops of red Tabasco sauce and serve with a piece of celery stalk
Drink the tequila and chase it with the celery for the full experience

name: Rum and Ginger Beer
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 10 oz of lime juice, 10 oz of sugar syrup and 50 oz of gold rum
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with lime zest

name: Imposter
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 2 oz of pineapple juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of apricot liqueur, 0.75 oz of gold rum and 1 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Add 0.5 oz of dark rum
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Ginger Passion
recipe: Place the pulp from 6 oz of passionfruit and a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a passionfruit quarter

name: Vertigo
recipe: Place 3 green grapes, a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of cranberry juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with green and red grapes on a cocktail skewer

name: Whisky and Ginger Beer
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Squeeze in lemon zest, then use it to garnish the cocktail

name: Ginger Blast
recipe: Place a slice of ginger root, seeds from a half of pomegranate into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with flamed orange zest

name: Quicksand
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz of Maraschino liqueur and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Papuan
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 ginger root wedges and 1 pineapple wedge into a shaker
Add 2 bar spoons of granulated sugar and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of yellow apple liqueur, 0.5 oz of Maraschino liqueur and 1.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with pineapple leaves

name: Ginger Chaser
recipe: A one-quart pitcher of chaser is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Place 13.5 oz of ginger root into a juicer and juice
Pour 20 oz of tomato juice, 7 oz of ginger juice and 6 oz of lemon juice into a pitcher
Add a a pinch of salt and ground black pepper, a finely-chopped cucumber half, 1.75 oz of rucola and stir gently  '
Pour gold tequila and chaser into shot glasses
Drink the tequila and chase it with the chaser

name: True Romance
recipe: Place a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of homemade coriander vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with pieces of candied ginger on a cocktail skewer

name: Indian Sour
recipe: Rim a sour glass with roasted sesame
Place a quarter of orange into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of cinnamon syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into the chilled sour glass

name: Irish Brothers
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of green apple liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of Irish cream liqueur, 0.35 oz of dry orange liqueur and 0.35 oz of Irish whiskey

name: Match Point
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of Irish whiskey
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Irish Old Fashioned
recipe: Place a cane sugar cube into a rocks glass and add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Add a chopped half of orange and muddle
Let it infuse for a minute, then remove the orange
Fill the rocks glass with ice cubes
Add 2 oz of homemade strawberry whiskey and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Irish Pie Toddy
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 4 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of vanilla syrup and 1.5 oz of Irish whiskey into a milk pitcher
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Squeeze orange zest over the cocktail, put it in the glass and add a cinnamon stick
Garnish with an apple slice

name: Irish Boozy Punch
recipe: A five-quart punch bowl is enough for 20-25 portions
Chop 4 pears into slices and put into the bowl
Add 2 oranges and 2 lemons chopped on wheels, 10 cinnamon sticks and 60 seeds of cardamom
Pour in 3.5 oz of lemon juice, 5 oz of orange juice, 7 oz of cinnamon syrup and 33.5 oz of Irish whiskey
Add 60 dashes of orange bitters
Top up with duchess pear lemonade and stir gently
Fill rocks glasses with ice cubes and punch
Garnish each cocktail with a slice of pear and ground nutmeg

name: Irish Strudel
recipe: Place a chopped apple wedge into a milk pitcher
Add 2 strips of lemon zest, a clove and a cinnamon stick
Pour in 7 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of yellow apple syrup, 0.75 oz of vanilla syrup and 2 oz of Irish whiskey
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a teapot
Serve on a base with a candle to prevent the cocktail from cooling

name: Love Actually
recipe: Rim a flute glass with granulated sugar
Place 12 bar spoons of tangerine puree into a mixing glass
Pour in 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.75 oz of vanilla vodka and 2.5 oz of brut champagne
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Finely strain into the chilled flute glass
Garnish with a tangerine wedge on a cocktail skewer

name: Spanish Eggnog
recipe: Fill a hurricane glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 5 quail egg yolks, 3 oz of milk, 0.75 oz of white cacao liqueur and 1.5 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the hurricane glass
Garnish with grated dark chocolate

name: Spanish Gold
recipe: Place a cinnamon stick, 3 chopped apple wedges, lemon and orange zest into a milk pitcher
Pour in 1.5 oz of apple juice, 3 oz of dry white wine and 1.5 oz of Drambuie
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with lemon and orange zest

name: True Passion
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of cranberry juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of passionfruit syrup and 0.75 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne
Garnish with a red Maraschino cherry and orange zest

name: Blackberry Caipirinha
recipe: Place 3 blackberries, 2 lime wedges into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of cachaca and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wheel and a blackberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Strawberry Caipirinha
recipe: Place 3 strawberries and 2 lime wedges into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 20 ml of sugar syrup and 50 ml of cachaca, then carefully mix with a bar spoon
Sprinkle some crushed ice on top
Garnish with half a strawberry

name: Caipiroska
recipe: Place 2 lime wedges into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of vodka and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Kalinka Malinka
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of viburnum into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of homemade raspberry vodka and 0.75 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a handful of viburnum

name: Sloe-infused Calvados
recipe: Fill a 2-quart bottle 3/4 of the way with sloe, without tamping
Add 6.5 oz of caster sugar, 2 cloves and top up with calvados
Close the jar and infuse for 3 weeks
The infusion is ready when the berries begin to float

name: Finish Him
recipe: One soda syphon is enough for about 5 rocks glasses
Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1.5 oz of lemon juice, 25 oz of sprite, 3.5 oz of triple sec liqueur and 3.5 oz of vodka into a soda syphon
Close the soda syphon and shake it 3-4 times
Pour the cocktail from the soda syphon into the rocks glass and garnish it with lemon zest

name: Kamikaze in a Shaker
recipe: One shaker is enough for about 10 shots
Pour in 3 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of sugar syrup, 3.5 oz of triple sec liqueur and 6.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into shot glasses
Serve with jellies

name: Capri
recipe: Place 30 tarragon leaves into a highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of lemongrass syrup and 1.5 oz of citrus vodka
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a tarragon sprig and lemon zest

name: Karel Gott
recipe: Place 2 raspberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.15 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of cranberry juice, 0.35 oz of triple sec liqueur, 1 oz of becherovka and 0.75 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Caribbean Touch
recipe: Remove the pineapple pulp using a pineapple slicer
Place 6 chopped pineapple wedges and a peeled kiwi half into a blender
Pour in 3.5 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 1.75 oz of mango liqueur and 3.5 oz of white rum
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into the pineapple
Garnish with orange and lime wedges, and a Maraschino cherry with a cocktail umbrella

name: Caribbean Breeze
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.75 oz of cranberry juice, 1.75 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.35 oz of passion fruit syrup, 1 oz of coconut liqueur, 1 oz of vanilla vodka and 1 oz of orange vodka
Stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Caribbean Coffee
recipe: Place 6 bar spoons of coconut puree into an Irish coffee glass
Pour in 0.75 oz of passionfruit syrup
Top up with 5 oz of hot Americano coffee and stir gently
Garnish with whipped cream and coffee beans

name: Caribbean Apple Pie
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 2.5 oz of cranberry juice, 0.75 oz of cinnamon syrup, 0.5 oz of creme de cassis liqueur and 2 oz of calvados into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges and a mint sprig

name: Caribbean Treasure
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 3 peeled and pitted lychees into a shaker and muddle
Pour 3 oz of pineapple juice, 1 oz of strawberry liqueur and 2 oz of coconut liqueur into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Garnish with strawberry halves and a mint sprig

name: Carlsbad Falls
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 4 oz of orange juice, 0.15 oz of maple syrup, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.5 oz of almond syrup and 2 oz of light beer into a milk pitcher
Add 3 cloves and a cinnamon stick
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with an orange wedge, a clove and a cinnamon stick

name: Carnival Collins
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 10 mint leaves and 2 bar spoons of granulated sugar into a shaker
Pour in 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a mint sprig and serve with a mate bombilla

name: Questo Successo
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of spiced syrup, 0.35 oz of raspberry liqueur, 1.5 oz of rose vermouth and 1 oz of sake into a mixing glass
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a kiwi wedge

name: Cape Codder
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Add 1 bar spoon of cranberries and 2 oz of vodka into the glass
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently

name: Cambridge
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 4 oz of apple juice and 1.5 oz of gin
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with an apple wedge

name: Kentucky Cooler
recipe: Pour boiling water over the cinnamon sticks and leave it for 1 minute
Place 3 heated cinnamon sticks into a highball glass and top up with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of apricot liqueur and 2 oz of bourbon
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with small lime wedges

name: Wednesday
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Place the pulp of a passionfruit half and squeeze 0.15 oz of ginger root juice into a shaker
Pour in 1.75 oz of orange juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of homemade spiced vodka
Add 1 clove, 1 star anise, a pinch of ground cinnamon and ground ginger into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Add 0.35 oz of pomegranate juice
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with an orange wheel, a star anise and a mint sprig

name: Fargo
recipe: Cut the top of a sweet bell pepper and remove its seeds
Fill the pepper to the top with crushed ice
Place a half of another sweet bell pepper, 10 chopped coriander leaves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the pepper
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a coriander sprig

name: Clubland
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry, 0.35 oz of white vermouth, 0.35 oz of dry vermouth and 1.5 oz of vodka into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with orange zest

name: Just Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Place 10 mint leaves into a pitcher
Squeeze 3 oz of lemon juice and place the squeezed lemon wedges into the pitcher
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Pour in 4 oz of sugar syrup
Top up with club soda and stir gently

name: Maple Apple
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of maple syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Top up with apple juice and stir gently
Garnish with an apple wheel

name: Maple Sour
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of maple syrup and 2 oz of vodka into a shaker
Add 3 dashes of Angostura bitters and 1 dash of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with flamed lemon zest and a Maraschino cherry

name: Pegu Club
recipe: Place 2 ice cubes into a cocktail glass
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of triple sec and 2 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 5 dashes of Angostura bitters and 5 dashes of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the cocktail glass
Garnish with a lime wheel with granulated cane sugar

name: Strawberry Mulled Wine
recipe: Place 3 bar spoons of strawberry jam into a milk pitcher
Pour in 5 oz of dry red wine
Add 1/3 bar spoons of ground cinnamon, 3 cloves, lemon and orange zests
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass

name: Strawberry Lemonade
recipe: Place 3 strawberries, 3 lime wedges into a hurricane glass and muddle
Fill the hurricane glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of strawberry syrup
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a half of strawberry, a mint leaf and a lime wedge

name: Devil Touch
recipe: Place 2 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled flute glass
Top up with brut champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a strawberry wheel

name: Strawberry Milkshake
recipe: Place 6 strawberries and 7 oz of strawberry ice cream into a milkshake mixer
Add 2.5 oz of milk
Mix without adding ice and pour into a milkshake sundae glass
Garnish with strawberry halves

name: Strawberry Sling
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 7 strawberries, a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.35 oz of sugar syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a strawberry and a mint sprig on a cocktail skewer

name: Night of the Hunter
recipe: Put 4 bar spoons of cranberry into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of rose vermouth and stir
Top up with crushed ice

name: Berry Mulled Wine
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of raspberry jam and 1 bar spoon of cranberries into a milk pitcher
Pour in 5 oz of dry red wine
Add orange and lemon zests, 1 bar spoon of vanilla granulated sugar, 3 cloves and a cinnamon stick
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Serve with a tartlet with dried apricots, dried plum and an apple wedge, dipped in honey

name: Cranberry Eggnog
recipe: Place 5 bar spoons of cranberries, 5 bar spoons of granulated sugar into a milk pitcher and muddle
Add 5 quail egg yolks, 0.75 oz of honey, 1.75 oz of light cream and 5 oz of milk
Stir while heating with the steam from a coffee machine, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with a cookie

name: Virginia
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of coconut liqueur
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Desert Island
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of coconut liqueur
Top up with cola and stir gently
Garnish with lime and lemon wheels

name: Tropical Sangria
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Slice in wedges an orange half, peeled kiwi and 7 strawberries and place them into a pitcher
Pour in 1.5 oz of sugar syrup, 13.5 oz of dry white wine, 8.5 oz of coconut liqueur and 3.5 oz of club soda
Top up with crushed ice and stir gently
Let sangria infuse for about 15 minutes and enjoy

name: Metropolis
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of coconut liqueur
Top up with apple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges

name: Tropical Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place 1 bar spoon of granulated cane sugar into a shaker
Pour in 3 oz of coconut milk, 17.5 oz of pineapple juice and 2.5 oz of yellow banana syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the pitcher
Top up with pineapple juice and stir gently
Garnish with half a passionfruit

name: Robinson
recipe: Place 5 mint leaves into a highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of coconut liqueur
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels and a mint sprig

name: Grapefruit Liqueur and Cola
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of grapefruit liqueur
Top up with cola and stir gently
Garnish with a small grapefruit wedge

name: The Connaught Martini
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of dry vermouth and 2.5 oz of vodka into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Add 3 dashes of grapefruit bitters (or any other aromatic bitters you prefer)
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Tropical Queen
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz of coconut water, 0.15 oz of cinnamon syrup, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.15 oz of coconut liqueur and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with cinnamon sticks

name: Strawberry Punch
recipe: One punch bowl is enough for about 20 rocks glasses
Place 2 tangerines chopped in wheels and 2 limes into a punch bowl
Blend 50 oz of frozen strawberries, 33.5 oz of granulated sugar and 25 oz of apple juice
Fill the punch bowl 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Pour the strawberry puree from the blender into the punch bowl and add 25 oz of white rum
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with rosemary sprigs and pour into rocks glasses

name: Bullet to the Head
recipe: Pour 1 oz of tomato juice into a shot glass
Add couple drops of red Tabasco sauce, a pinch of ground black pepper and a pinch of salt
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of silver tequila
Garnish with a jalapeno
Pour 10 oz of light beer into a pint glass
Drink the shot, bite the jalapeno and chase it with the beer

name: Cherry-infused Cognac
recipe: Fill a two-quart jar 3/4 of the way with pitted sweet cherries without tamping
Add 7 oz of caster sugar, a vanilla pod and top up with cognac
Close the jar and infuse for 2 weeks
The infusion is ready when cherries begin to float

name: French Cinnamon
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 2 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of caramel syrup and 1 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with 2 cinnamon sticks

name: Royal Rhubarb
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of rhubarb liqueur into a chilled flute glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry

name: Apple of Discord
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 5 arugala leaves, 6 apple wedges into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of yellow apple liqueur
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges and rucola leaves

name: Honeymoon
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of honey syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of coffee liqueur, 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of cognac

name: Cosmo Passion Tea
recipe: Place a quarter of lime, a grapefruit wedge and an orange wedge into a milk pitcher
Add a cinnamon stick
Pour in 3 oz of apple juice, 7 oz of cranberry juice, 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.75 of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of citrus vodka
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a teapot
Serve on a base with a candle to prevent the cocktail from cooling

name: Cosmo Tea
recipe: Place a quarter of lime, a grapefruit wedge and an orange wedge into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 3.5 oz of apple juice and 3.5 oz of cranberry juice
Add a cinnamon stick and a clove
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a teapot
Serve on a base with a candle to prevent the cocktail from cooling

name: Cosmopolitan Jelly
recipe: Blend 6 bar spoons of cranberries and place the puree into a mixing glass
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of vodka
Add a half of strawberry and 4 blackberries and stir gently
Pour 1/3 of the pre-mixed drink into a milk pitcher and add 1/3 bar spoons of gelatine
Stir and add rest of the cocktail
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Chill the drink and pour into a chilled champagne saucer
Place the cocktail into a refrigerator to let the jelly solidify and serve it with a teaspoon

name: Cranberrini
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of cranberries into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.5 oz of rose vermouth and 1 oz of gin
Stir gently and top up with crushed ice
Garnish with cranberries and caster sugar

name: Red Square
recipe: Place 8 bar spoons of raspberry puree, 2 rosemary sprigs into a shaker and muddle
Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of vanilla syrup and 2 oz of Becherovka into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a rosemary sprig

name: Ruby Punch
recipe: A 5-quart punch bowl is enough for about 20–25 portions
Fill a punch bowl 1/3 of the way with ice cubes
Add about 15 red Maraschino cherries and an orange, lemon and lime, sliced in wheels
Pour in 7 oz of grenadine syrup, 43 oz of dry red wine, 10 oz of creme de cassis liqueur and 10 oz of white rum
Top up with champagne and stir gently

name: Psycho
recipe: Place 5 raspberries, 1 peeled kumquat into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 1 oz of cranberry juice and 0.75 oz of sugar syrup
Add 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky and stir
Top up with crushed ice

name: Red Dog
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.15 oz of red Tabasco sauce and 1 oz of silver tequila

name: Red Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.75 oz of honey syrup, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Carefully add 1 oz of dry red wine
Enjoy the beauty of the color combination and stir gently

name: Red Tea
recipe: Place chopped lemon and orange quarters into a milk pitcher and muddle
Add 2 cloves, a pinch of ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon and vanilla granulated sugar
Pour in 2 oz of grenadine and 5 oz of still water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass

name: Creme de la Creme
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of aloe vera juice, 0.75 oz of caramel syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Kremlin Strudel
recipe: Place 1 bar spoon of cranberries into a milk pitcher and muddle
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 3.5 oz of apple juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of calvados into the milk pitcher
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into an Irish coffee glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of heavy cream
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a half of kumquat on a cocktail skewer

name: Strong Mulled Wine
recipe: Chop a quarter of orange, a quarter of lemon and a half of apple into small pieces
Place the fruits into a milk pitcher
Pour in 1.5 oz of honey, 5 oz of dry red wine and 2 oz of cognac
Add 2 cloves and a pinch of ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg and ground black pepper
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with apple wedges and a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Bonnie and Clyde
recipe: Pour 2 oz of chilled becherovka into a shot glass
Place 1 bar spoon of gooseberry jam into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1 oz of green apple liqueur
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into another shot glass
You can drink in any order

name: Bloody Little Masha
recipe: Pour 1 oz of tomato juice into a shot glass
Add a drop of lemon juice, red Tabasco sauce and Worcestershire sauce
Add a small pinch of salt, ground black pepper and stir gently
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of homemade pepper vodka
Garnish with a pickle covered in honey
Drink the shot and chase it with a pickle

name: Bloody Jane
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 4 oz of tomato juice, 0.35 oz of wine vinegar and 2 oz of silver tequila
Add a pinch of salt and a pinch of ground black pepper, 3 drops of red Tabasco sauce and stir gently
Garnish with a half of lime with salt

name: Bloody Joseph
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 4 oz of tomato juice, 0.35 oz of wine vinegar and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Add a pinch of salt and ground black pepper, 3 drops of red Tabasco sauce and stir gently
Garnish with a lemon wheel

name: Cucaracha
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of mango liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of dry orange liqueur and 0.5 oz of silver tequila

name: Tea with Kumquat
recipe: Place 4 chopped kumquats, 3 lime leaves, 5 cloves and 1 cardamom seed into a rocks glass
Pour in 0.75 oz of passionfruit syrup
Top up with hot dianhong tea and stir gently

name: Courtesan
recipe: Rim a cognac glass with granulated cane sugar
Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 6 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of amaretto and 1 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into the cognac glass
Garnish with a strawberry and a mint leaf

name: Candy
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of mango juice, 0.5 oz of coffee liqueur and 0.5 oz of limoncello into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Lavender Creme Brulee
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of condensed milk, 2 oz of advocaat liqueur and 1 oz of homemade lavender vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Use a culinary torch to burn granulated sugar in a teaspoon
Garnish the cocktail with burnt caramel

name: Avalanche
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of white cacao liqueur and 0.5 oz of Southern Comfort

name: Plum
recipe: Place 1 oz of vanilla ice cream into a shaker
Pour in 0.75 oz of Pedro Ximenez and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with grated dark chocolate

name: Portuguese Flip
recipe: Pour 5 quail egg yolks, 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of Tawny port and 1 oz of calvados into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled sour glass
Garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon

name: Forest Berries
recipe: Rim a cocktail glass with chopped rose petals
Place 2 strawberries, 4 raspberries, 4 blackberries, 1 bar spoon of bilberries into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the chilled cocktail glass

name: Flying Grasshopper
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of light cream, 0.5 oz of green mint liqueur, 0.5 oz of white cacao liqueur and 0.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass

name: Summer Breeze
recipe: Place chopped lime and orange quarters into a hurricane glass and muddle
Fill the hurricane glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of rose syrup and 0.75 oz of tangerine syrup
Top up with light beer and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a physalis, orange and lime wedges

name: Summer Evening in Cannes
recipe: Place the pulp of a watermelon wedge, 2 blackberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup and 1.5 oz of blackcurrant vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled flute glass
Garnish with a ball of watermelon on a cocktail skewer

name: Summer Fizz
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.75 oz of creme de cassis liqueur
Pour 2.5 oz of orange juice and 15 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda
Garnish with a sprig of redcurrant

name: All About Eve
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of mango liqueur
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Garnish with small mango slices

name: Up
recipe: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of mango liqueur and 0.35 oz of lime juice
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mango slice

name: Linden Tea
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of maple syrup into an Irish coffee glass
Top up with hot linden tea and stir gently
Garnish with a thyme sprig and 3 apple slices

name: Lolita
recipe: Place a slice of chili pepper wheel into a mixing glass and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 0.75 oz of peach liqueur
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of silver tequila

name: Killer Punch
recipe: A 5-quart punch bowl is enough for about 20-25 portions
Fill a punch bowl 1/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place a sliced in wheels 1 lemon and 1 lime into the punch bowl
Pour in 12 oz of lemon juice, 13 oz of sugar syrup, 10 oz of triple sec liqueur, 10 oz of silver tequila, 10 oz of white rum, 10 oz of gin and 10 oz of vodka
Top up with cola and stir gently

name: Berry Killer
recipe: Fill a red wine glass 1/3 of the way with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of raspberry syrup, 0.75 oz of triple sec, 0.75 oz of silver tequila and 0.75 oz of white rum
Add 0.75 oz of gin and 0.75 oz of vodka and stir gently
Place 2 chopped strawberries and blackberries
Add redcurrant from 2 bunches and two mint leaves
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and redcurrant sprinkled with caster sugar

name: Horse's Neck in a Siphon
recipe: One soda siphon is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of ginger root juice, 2 oz of sugar syrup, 22 oz of ginger beer and 7 oz of cognac into a soda syphon
Close the soda syphon and froth 3–4 times
Pour the cocktail from the soda syphon into the highball glass and garnish it with lemon zest

name: Sweetheart
recipe: Place a wild hibiscus flower into a champagne saucer and pour in 0.5 oz of syrup
Top up with champagne

name: Madame Coffee
recipe: Pour 1 oz of Irish cream and 0.5 oz of vanilla syrup into an Irish coffee glass
Top up with hot Americano coffee and stir gently
Garnish with whipped cream

name: Golden Mai Tai
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of almond syrup, 0.5 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of gold rum into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wedge and a mint sprig

name: Pink Mai Tai
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of almond syrup, 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Add 0.35 oz of grenadine syrup
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with cherries

name: Triple Mai Tai
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of orange juice, 0.75 oz of pineapple juice, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.35 oz of almond syrup and 0.75 oz of triple sec
Add 0.75 oz of white rum, 0.75 oz of dark rum and 0.75 oz of gold rum and stir gently
Garnish with lime zest with pineapple puree, a cane sugar cube and a pineapple leaf

name: Malevich
recipe: Pour 2 oz of vodka into a shot glass
Pour 0.5 oz of honey into another shot glass and dip a slice of pickle on a cocktail skewer in it
Drink the shot and chase it with the cucumber in honey

name: Malecon
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of oloroso sherry, 0.5 oz of tawny port and 1.5 oz of white rum into a shaker
Add 2 bar spoons of caster sugar and 2 dashes of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Little Salty Dog
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of grapefruit juice into a shot glass
Add 0.5 oz of grapefruit liqueur and stir gently
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of vodka

name: General
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of honey syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of citrus vodka
Garnish with a peeled salted grapefruit wedge on a cocktail skewer
Drink the shot and chase it with the grapefruit

name: Small Hummer
recipe: Place 3 bar spoons of redcurrant puree into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of sloe gin, 0.35 oz of champagne and 0.35 oz of absinthe

name: Raspberry Journey
recipe: Place a half of chopped apple, 3 raspberries into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of raspberry syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice

name: Rush
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2.5 oz of cranberry juice and 2 oz of raspberry vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wheel and a raspberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Raspberry Eggnog
recipe: Place 5 bar spoons of raspberries, 5 bar spoons of granulated sugar into a milk pitcher and muddle
Add 5 quail egg yolks, 0.75 oz of honey, 2 oz of light cream and 5 oz of milk
Stir while heating with the steam from coffee machine, but do not bring to the boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with 2 cookies

name: Raspberry Lemonade
recipe: Place 10 raspberries, a chopped half of lime into a hurricane glass and muddle
Fill the hurricane glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of raspberry syrup
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with 2 raspberries, a lime wedge and a mint sprig

name: Now You See Me
recipe: Place 3 raspberries into a highball glass and muddle
Add a lemon wheel and fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of raspberry syrup
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a mint sprig, a lemon and a lime wheel

name: Raspberry Milkshake
recipe: Place 10 raspberries and 7 oz of raspberry ice cream into a milkshake mixer
Pour in 3 oz of milk
Mix without adding ice and pour into a milkshake sundae glass
Garnish with raspberries

name: Crimson Jacket
recipe: Pour 2 oz of homemade raspberry vodka into a shot glass
Pour 1 oz of blackcurrant syrup into another shot glass and dip a dried apricot on a cocktail skewer in it
Drink the shot and chase it with the apricot

name: Raspberry Tea
recipe: Place 5 raspberries, 3 bar spoons of granulated sugar into a milk pitcher and muddle
Add 1.5 oz of honey and 5 oz of still water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with raspberries on a cocktail skewer and lemon zest

name: Annie Hall
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 20 raspberries, 1 red basil leaf into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.35 oz of sugar syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a raspberry on a cocktail skewer and a mint sprig

name: Raspberry Cheesecake
recipe: Place 5 bar spoons of raspberry puree into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass
Place 1 bar spoon of cream cheese into a cream whipper
Pour in 0.15 oz of milk and 0.15 oz of still water
Close the cream whipper and froth 3–4 times
Garnish the cocktail with creamy foam from the whipper

name: Mango Daiquiri
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of mango liqueur and 1.5 oz of white rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a slice of mango

name: Mango Cobbler
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 2 slices of mango into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of yellow banana liqueur and 1.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a slice of mango on a cocktail skewer and a mint sprig

name: Million Dollar Baby
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1.5 oz of mango juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with 2 mango wedges

name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of mango liqueur, 0.5 oz of triple sec liqueur and 0.5 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass
Garnish with ground nutmeg
Pour 1.5 oz of champagne into another shot glass
You can drink them in any order you wish

name: Persona
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 3 mango wedges into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.35 oz of ginger syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a mango wedge and a mint sprig

name: Tangerine Margarita
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 9 bar spoons of tangerine puree into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice 0.5 oz of agave syrup and 1.5 oz of gold tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the goblet glass
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Orange Mood
recipe: Place tangerine wheels and half of a lime into a red wine glass and muddle
Fill the red wine glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of tangerine syrup
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with two tangerine wheels and a mint sprig

name: Tangerine Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Place 2 tangerines chopped into quarters, 30 mint leaves into a pitcher and muddle
Fill 2/3 of the pitcher with crushed ice
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice and 2 oz of passionfruit syrup
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Vitamin Tea
recipe: Place a quarter of lime, tangerine, grapefruit and a cinnamon stick into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.5 oz of blackcurrant syrup, 4 oz of tangerine juice and 5 oz of still water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a teapot
Serve on a saucer with a candle to prevent the cocktail from cooling

name: Monkey Business
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves, 1 bar spoon of granulated cane sugar into a copper mug and muddle
Fill the mug to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of maple syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Add 2 dashes of peach bitters and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and caster sugar

name: Hibiscus Margarita
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 2 oz of hibiscus syrup, 0.5 oz of agave syrup and 2 oz of gold tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the goblet glass
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Homemade Margarita
recipe: Fill a cup to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of triple sec and 1 oz of gold tequila
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a lime wheel

name: Sugar-free Margarita
recipe: Rim a margarita glass with salt
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of triple sec and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled margarita glass
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Pineapple Margarita
recipe: Place 4 pineapple slices, 3 sage leaves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of gold tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a sage leaf

name: Morning Margarita
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of orange jam into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1.5 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 1oz of triple sec  and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a red Maraschino cherry

name: Marmalade Margarita
recipe: Fill the jar to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 bar spoons of orange jam into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.15 oz of honey syrup, 0.35 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of gold tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the jar
Garnish with grapefruit zest

name: Moroccan Smash
recipe: Place 3 orange wheels and 2 lemon wheels into a rocks glass, then muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup
Add 2 oz of Scotch whisky and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Martini Mojitato
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves, a quarter of lime into a highball glass and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of limoncello, 1 oz of dry vermouth and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with 1 dash of Angostura bitters and a mint sprig

name: Martini Royale
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2.5 oz of white vermouth
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels and a mint sprig

name: Mask of Evil
recipe: Place a Maraschino cherry into a shot glass
Pour in 1 oz of lychee liqueur
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of dark rum

name: Matador
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of orange juice, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.35 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.35 oz of white vermouth and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Add 0.15 oz of orange flower water and 1 dash of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with an orange wheel and a Maraschino cherry

name: Clockwork Orange
recipe: Place a cinnamon stick into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.35 oz of honey, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 5 oz of orange juice and 2 oz of white rum
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a warmed cup
Serve with a tartlet with dried apricots, dried plum and an apple wedge covered in honey

name: Honey Versailles
recipe: Place blackberries into a heated frying pan and add 0.35 oz of honey
Stir on low heat until mixture reaches a uniform consistency
Add a stalk of lemon grass, 0.35 oz of triple sec liqueur and 2 oz of cognac
Set the contents of the frying pan on fire, and let them burn a little bit
Finely strain into a cognac glass
Garnish with a blackberry

name: Honey Cosmo
recipe: Place 4 raspberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of apple juice, 1 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of citrus vodka
Add 1 dash of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with grapefruit zest

name: Honey Smash
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of honey syrup, 0.75 oz of orange juice and 1.5 oz of orange vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a raspberry and an orange wheel on a cocktail skewer

name: Honey Whisper
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Add 1 dash of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the highball glass
Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of honey and 4 oz of club soda into a soda syphon
Close the soda syphon and froth 3–4 times
Garnish the cocktail with foam from the soda siphon and a pinch of smoked salt

name: Jellyfish
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of white cacao liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur and 0.35 oz of absinthe
Carefully add 0.15 oz of Irish cream, drop by drop, using a drinking straw

name: Mexican Taxi Driver
recipe: Place a grapefruit, an orange, a lime and a lemon wedge into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 1 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of silver tequila and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with orange, lemon and lime wedges

name: Mexican Breakfast
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a half of peeled, pitted and chopped avocado into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of milk, 0.5 oz of agave syrup, 0.75 oz of Benedictine and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with lime wheels

name: Mexican Mule
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 slices of ginger root, a quarter of orange into a shaker and muddle
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wedge and a slice of ginger root

name: Mexican Pie
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 5 quail egg yolks, 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.75 oz of orange juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the red wine glass
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: The Sting
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of melon liqueur
Top up with tonic and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wheel

name: The Bodyguard
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 4 raspberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of orange juice, 0.35 oz of honey syrup, and 2 oz of vodka into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Milan Breeze
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.75 oz of rose vermouth and 0.75 oz of vodka
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Milan Spritz
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.75 oz of Campari and 4 oz of dry white wine
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Mitsubishi
recipe: Place a slice of ginger root into a mixing glass and pour in 0.15 oz of sugar syrup
Add 0.15 oz of lemon juice and muddle
Strain ginger mix into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of melon liqueur and 0.75 oz of silver tequila

name: M & M's
recipe: Pour 1.5 oz of still water, 0.15 oz of lime juice, 3 oz of sea buckthorn juice and 1.5 oz of bourbon into a milk pitcher
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a warmed cup
Serve with a tartlet with an apple wedge, dried apricot and dried plum covered in honey

name: Scarface
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of milk, 1 oz of heavy cream, 1 oz of Irish cream liqueur, 1 oz of coffee liqueur and 1 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass

name: Deerstalker
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of amaretto and 0.75 oz of vodka

name: Rejuvenating Apple
recipe: Place a peeled and chopped apple half into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of yellow apple syrup and 1.5 oz of calvados
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Strain into a chilled rocks glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with an apple wedge

name: Milk and Honey
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.5 oz of cinnamon syrup, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with ground cinnamon, a red Maraschino cherry and a mint leaf

name: Lucy
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 2.5 oz of milk, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of vanilla syrup and 1.5 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the collins glass
Garnish with ground nutmeg

name: Noah
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.75 oz of milk, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the red wine glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Monk
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of dry vermouth, 0.75 oz of green chartreuse and 2 oz of gin into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with lime zest

name: Chupa Chups
recipe: Place chopped lime and orange halves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of cinnamon syrup and 1.5 oz of orange vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Pour into a highball glass with ice
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with lollipops

name: Stand by Me
recipe: Place 2 strawberries, 2 raspberries, and 1 bar spoon of bilberry into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of cranberry juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of creme de cassis liqueur and 1 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a redcurrant sprig

name: Sea Breeze
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of grapefruit juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with cranberries and orange wedge

name: Sea Wolf
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of orange juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wedge

name: Sandthorn Fever
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of sea buckthorn and 6 mint leaves into an irish coffee glass
Pour in 1 oz hazelnut syrup and 2 oz gin
Top up with hot assam tea and stir gently
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: The Wizard of Oz
recipe: Fill a collins glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 3 oz of pineapple juice, 1 oz of coconut liqueur and 1 oz of melon liqueur
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wedge and a lime wheel

name: Spring Punch
recipe: Put 5 raspberries in a sling glass, add 0.35 oz of honey and muddle
Fill the sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and 2 raspberries on a cocktail skewer

name: High Noon
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 2 dried plums, 3 cloves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.75 oz of creme de cassis liqueur and 1.5 oz of vodka
