Squeeze orange zest
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with tawny port
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with orange zest and a sprig of mint

name: Blackberry Mojito
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves and 10 blackberries into a highball glass
Add 3 lime wedges and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of blackberry syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and a blackberry

name: Strawberry Mojito
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves and 3 lime wedges into a highball glass
Add 5 strawberries and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of strawberry syrup and 2 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and a strawberry

name: Royal Mojito
recipe: Place 5 mint leaves into a red wine glass
Fill the red wine glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wheel and a mint sprig

name: Raspberry Mojito
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves and 10 raspberries into a highball glass
Add 3 lime wedges and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of raspberry syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and a raspberry

name: In the Mood for Love
recipe: Place 2 blackberries, 2 strawberries, 1 bar spoon of bilberries and 5 mint leaves and into a red wine glass
Add 2 bar spoons of granulated sugar and muddle
Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of white rum
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with raspberries, bilberries and redcurrants

name: Mojito Shakerato
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 10 mint leaves and 1 bar spoon of granulated cane sugar into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with mint leaves
Serve with a 1.5 oz of champagne

name: Mule with Cinnamon
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 8 bar spoons of lychee puree into a mixing glass
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into the highball glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a lime wedge

name: Mulatto Daisy
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of galliano into a chilled champagne saucer
Swish the sides of the champagne saucer with it and drink
Rim the glass with cocoa powder
Place 1/2 bar spoon of fennel seeds and 1 bar spoon of caster sugar into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of dark cacao liqueur and 1.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the champagne saucer

name: Moulin Rouge
recipe: Place 6 bar spoons of raspberry puree and 10 bar spoons of lychee puree into a mixing glass
Add 0.35 oz of calvados and 2.5 oz of champagne
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled flute glass
Garnish with raspberries on a cocktail skewer

name: Mint Mulled Wine
recipe: Place 2 strawberries, 2 raspberries and 2 blackberries into a milk pitcher
Add 6 mint leaves, 0.35 oz of honey and muddle
Pour in 5 oz of dry red wine, 0.35 oz of creme de cassis liqueur and 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Add 4 cloves and heat
Heat, but do not bring to a boil
Pour through a sieve into an Irish coffee glass
Stick a cocktail skewer into a cinnamon stick and add a raspberry and blackberry
Pour honey over the berries and place a mint leaf on top

name: Mint Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill a pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place 30 mint leaves into a blender
Pour in 1.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of lime juice
Give it a good dry shake
Pour into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with red basil leaves

name: The Graduate
recipe: Put 30 mint leaves into an Irish coffee glass
Pour in 1 oz of tangerine syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon and 2 cloves
Top up with hot sencha tea and stir gently
Garnish with mint leaves

name: The Rum Diary
recipe: Place 5 mint leaves into a highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of white rum
Top up with green iced tea and stir gently

name: One Night
recipe: Place 5 mint leaves, 9 bar spoons of blackcurrant into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.15 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of caramel syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a mint leaf

name: Nano Mojito
recipe: Fill the tasting set to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of white rum into a mixing glass
Add 3 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into 4 shot glasses
Place 20 mint leaves into a blender
Pour in 6 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of sugar syrup and 5 oz of club soda
Blend and place the resulting foam into each shot glass
Place the shot glasses together
Garnish with a mint sprig, a lime wheel, strawberries, blackberries and raspberries on cocktail skewers

name: Naomi
recipe: Place 3 blackberries, 3 raspberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur and 1.5 oz blackcurrant vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Pour 1.75 oz of heavy cream and 0.15 oz of vanilla syrup into a bowl
Whisk thoroughly
Use a bar spoon to layer on vanilla whipped cream from the bowl onto the cocktail
Garnish with a blackberry on a cocktail skewer
If preparing multiple cocktails at once and using more than 17 oz of heavy cream, it is more convenient to use a cream whipper

name: Our Mary
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of vodka
Blend 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 4.5 oz of tomato juice, 0.15 oz of Worcestershire sauce, 1 drop of red Tabasco sauce and a pinch of celery salt
Pour the contents of the blender into the sling glass and stir gently
Garnish with a pickle

name: Heaven
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of a chopped fennel root, 3 chopped strawberries into a rocks glass and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Top up with brut champagne and stir
Garnish with a chopped strawberry and fennel root wedges

name: Innocent Sex
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur
Carefully pour in 0.35 oz of Irish cream liqueur using a drinking straw
Light up and quickly drink through the drinking straw

name: Negroni from the Bronx
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of tawny port, 1.5 oz of dry red wine, 0.5 oz of Drambuie and 1 oz of Campari into a mixing glass
Add 3 dashes of peach and plum bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Normand Smash
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves and 1/4 of a lime into a highball glass and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of calvados
Top up with brut champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Normand Tea
recipe: Place one third of a chopped green apple, a cinnamon stick and a clove into an Irish coffee glass
Pour in 0.75 oz of white cocoa liqueur and 1.5 oz of calvados
Top up with hot earl grey tea and stir gently
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a green apple wedge

name: Dracula
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 2 oz of cherry syrup, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of bourbon into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and lime leaves

name: A Night in Tunisia
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.75 oz of orange juice, 0.75 oz of red vermouth, 0.35 oz of apricot liqueur and 1.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Add absinthe and light it up
As the cocktail burns, squeeze orange zest over it and add a little bit of ground cinnamon
Wait until absinthe finishes burning and drink

name: The New Yorker
recipe: Pour 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup and 1.5 oz of Irish whiskey into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with orange zest

name: Monkey Brains
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of yellow banana liqueur into a shot glass
Mix 0.15 oz of Irish cream and 0.5 oz of lemon juice into another shot glass, so that the Irish cream clots
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.15 oz of clotted liqueur and 0.75 oz of vodka
Carefully add 5 drops of grenadine syrup using a drinking straw

name: Clouds
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Then add 0.75 oz of silver tequila
Carefully add 3 drops of Irish cream and blue curacao using a drinking straw
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of absinthe

name: New New York
recipe: Place 5 bar spoons of peach puree into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of dry vermouth and 2 oz of gin
Add 0.15 oz of orange flower water and 3 dashes of rhubarb bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Pour in 0.15 oz of club soda and squeeze lemon zest over the cocktail

name: Basil Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place a small peeled and chopped cucumber and 12 leaves of green basil into a blender
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice and 1.5 oz of lychee syrup
Blend without ice
Pour into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with strawberry halves and a sprig of green basil

name: Frankenstein
recipe: Fill a sling glass half-way with crushed ice and add 5 mint leaves
Top up with ice
Place 1/4 of a chopped cucumber into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of lychee liqueur, 0.5 oz of limoncello and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Garnish with a lime wedge and a sliver of a cucumber

name: Cucumber Lemonade
recipe: Place 6 cucumber wheels, a lime wedge, 2 orange wedges into a sling glass and muddle
Fill the sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of honey syrup
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a sprig of rosemary and a cucumber wheel

name: Cucumber Tini
recipe: Place 4 cucumber wheels into a shaker
Muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled flute glass
Garnish with cucumber wheels on 2 cocktail skewers

name: Oxford Punch
recipe: A 5-quart punch bowl is enough for about 20–25 portions
Fill the punch bowl 1/3 of the way with ice cubes
Add 15 red Maraschino cherries and 2 oranges chopped in wheels
Pour in 27 oz of orange juice, 7 oz of sugar syrup, 7 oz of triple sec and 7 oz of gin
Top up with brut champagne and stir gently

name: Chamomile Old Fashioned
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of honey, 0.35 oz of cooled chamomile tea and 2 oz of bourbon into a rocks glass
Add 2 dashes of orange bitters
Fill the rocks glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: The Truman Show
recipe: Pour 2 oz of silver tequila and 0.35 oz of agave syrup into a rocks glass
Add 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters and 2 dashes of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes and stir gently
Garnish with an orchid flower and grapefruit zest

name: Oldboy
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 3 strawberries, 2 bar spoons of granulated cane sugar into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 3 oz of grapefruit juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the highball glass
Sprinkle with ground cinnamon and garnish with a chili pepper pod

name: Thai Dessert
recipe: Place 3 lime leaves, 2 slices of ginger root, 2 chili pepper wheels and a chopped half of lemon grass stalk into a shaker and muddle
Add 6 bar spoons of coconut puree
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with chili pepper wheels and a coriander sprig

name: Yin Yang
recipe: Place 9 mint leaves into a highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a mint leaf

name: Orange Tini
recipe: Place the seeds from a small pomegranate wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of orange vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Maleficent
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2.5 oz of pineapple juice and 1.5 oz of orange vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a pineapple wheel

name: Strawberry Margarita
recipe: Rim a margarita glass with sugar
Place 6 strawberries into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into the chilled margarita glass
Garnish with a strawberry half on a cocktail skewer

name: My Favourite Maria
recipe: Rim a champagne saucer with caster sugar
Place 2 bar spoons of orange jam into a shaker
Add 6 raspberries, 5 mint leaves and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of raspberry syrup, 1 oz of passionfruit syrup and 1.5 oz of genever
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with 3 Maraschino cherries with mint leaves on a cocktail skewer

name: Virgin Mojito
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves and 3 lime wedges into a highball glass
Pour in 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Blueberry Mojito
recipe: Place 10 mint leaves and 5 bar spoons of blueberries into a highball glass
Add 3 lime wedges and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a mint sprig and bilberries

name: New Fashioned
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 4 chopped strawberries, a chopped celery stalk into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of strawberry syrup, 0.75 oz of Drambuie and 2 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with half of a strawberry and a sliver of a celery stalk

name: Sea Buckthorn Mulled Wine
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of sea buckthorn into a milk pitcher
Add a small orange wedge, lemon zest, 3 cloves and a cinnamon stick
Pour in 5 oz of dry red wine and 0.35 oz of triple sec
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with a thyme sprig

name: Sea Buckthorn Daiquiri
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of sea buckthorn jam into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of white rum
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a rosemary sprig

name: Bitter Orange
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of red vermouth, 2 oz of Campari and stir
Garnish with orange zest

name: Orange Soul
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of carrot juice, 0.75 oz of orange juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 0.75 oz of triple sec and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Garnish with ground cinnamon

name: Acute Tropicana
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 3 pineapple wedges, a ginger root wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the red wine glass
Garnish with a pineapple leaf

name: By Alice
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of silver tequila and 0.5 oz of triple sec
Garnish with a small kiwi wheel

name: Postcard from Italy
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of agave syrup, 1 oz of amaro and 1.5 oz of gold tequila into a shaker
Add 1 dash of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled goblet glass
Sprinkle with Amontillado sherry

name: Vacation in Jamaica
recipe: Rim a champagne saucer with coconut flakes
Place 1/4 of a peeled and chopped banana into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of heavy cream, 0.5 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of caramel syrup, 0.75 oz of coconut liqueur and 1.25 oz of gold rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a banana wheel and a mint sprig

name: Hunter
recipe: Pour 1 oz of cherry liqueur and 2 oz of bourbon into a mixing glass
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Samurai
recipe: One sake set is enough for about 5 portions
Place a slice of ginger root into a milk pitcher and muddle
Pour in 3.5 oz of jasmine tea, 0.35 oz of honey syrup, 0.35 oz of vanilla syrup and 3.5 oz of sake
Stir while heating but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into a sake set
Serve in a sake cup with rose petals

name: Missionary's Downfall
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Place a peeled and chopped pineapple wheel into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of peach liqueur and 2 oz of white rum
Add 5 mint leaves
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a pineapple wedge, a sprig of mint and a red Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Paloma
recipe: Rim a highball glass with salt
Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1.75 oz of grapefruit juice and 2 oz of homemade strawberry tequila
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a chopped strawberry, a lime wheel and a mint sprig

name: Paloma Chaser
recipe: A one-quart pitcher of the chaser is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Pour 2.5 oz of lime juice, 7 oz of honey syrup and 20 oz of grapefruit juice into a pitcher
Add 1 bar spoon of salt and stir
Pour gold tequila and chaser into shot glasses
Drink the tequila and chase it with the chaser

name: Blonde
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 10 mint leaves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of cinnamon syrup, 3 oz of apple juice and 1.5 oz of pear vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a mint sprig

name: Daddy
recipe: Place 20 mint leaves and a ginger root wedge into a sling glass
Add 2 bar spoons of granulated sugar and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a fan of ginger wedges

name: Watermelon Tini
recipe: Place the pulp of a watermelon wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.25 oz of watermelon syrup, 0.25 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a watermelon wedge

name: Parkside Fizz
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 10 mint leaves into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of almond syrup and 2 oz of citrus vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a lemon wheel and a mint sprig

name: Pacha Ibiza
recipe: Place a peeled and chopped kiwi into a blender
Add 10 bar spoons of cherry jam
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of dark rum
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a hurricane glass
Garnish with two cherries

name: Pacha Monaco
recipe: Place a grapefruit, lemon and lime wedges, chopped into large pieces into a hurricane glass
Add a pinch of salt and muddle
Fill the hurricane glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup and 0.75 oz of calvados
Add 1.5 oz of gin and stir gently
Garnish with a carambola wedge, a kiwi wedge and two cherries

name: Pacha Monte Carlo
recipe: Place a half of a canned peach into a blender
Pour in 1.5 oz of sugar syrup, 3 oz of red vermouth and 1.5 oz of calvados
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a hurricane glass
Garnish with two cherries

name: Pacha Moscow
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of cranberry juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 1 oz of melon syrup and and 2 oz of raspberry vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a red Maraschino cherry

name: Pacha New York
recipe: Place 2 peeled tangerines and peeled and chopped half of a green apple into a blender
Pour in 1.5 oz of orange juice, 0.75 oz of blue curacao and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a hurricane glass
Garnish with two cherries

name: Pacha Sao Paulo
recipe: Place 3 mango wedges into a blender
Pour in 3.5 oz of pineapple juice, 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.75 oz of coconut liqueur and 1.5 oz of dark rum
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a hurricane glass
Garnish with two cherries

name: Pedro Manhattan
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry and 2 oz of bourbon into a mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of Peychaud's bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a red Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Don Pedro
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a chili pepper wheel into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a chili pepper pod

name: Pelican
recipe: Place half of a peeled, chopped banana and 2 strawberries into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.35 oz of strawberry syrup and 5 oz of peach juice
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a highball glass
Garnish with a banana wheel and half of a strawberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Peach Whiskey Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of peach bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with 3 red Maraschino cherries on a cocktail skewer

name: Pleased Peach
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of peach liqueur
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice and garnish with orange zest

name: Mrs. Wolfe
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 1.5 oz of peach liqueur
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels

name: Perfect Continuous
recipe: Place 3 strawberries into a blender
Pour in 1.5 oz of heavy cream, 0.75 oz of strawberry syrup, 0.75 oz of caramel syrup, 1.5 oz of Irish cream liqueur and 1 oz of white rum
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a highball glass
Garnish with a strawberry

name: Northern Sling
recipe: Place 9 bar spoons of bilberries into a sling glass and muddle
Fill the sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of blackcurrant syrup, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.25 oz of gin
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wheel and a mint sprig

name: Pilot
recipe: Pour equal parts of absinthe and energy drink into a shot glass

name: Pimms No. 6
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1.5 oz of red vermouth, 0.75 oz of amaro and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with cucumber stripes, a pineapple wheel and strawberry halves with the mint on a cocktail skewer

name: Piña Colada in a Coconut
recipe: Cut a coconut in halves and remove the pulp
Fill a cocktail glass halfway with crushed ice and then place a coconut shell in it
Place a half of a peeled and chopped pineapple wheel and 6 bar spoons of coconut cream into a blender
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of white rum
Give it a good dry shake
Add some crushed ice and blend again
Pour into the coconut shell
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a piece of pineapple and a red Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer and pineapple leaves

name: Homemade Piña Colada
recipe: Place 3 small pineapple wedges, 2 bar spoons of granulated sugar into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1.5 oz of coconut water, 1.5 oz of pineapple juice and 2 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled flute glass
Garnish with pineapple leaves

name: The Silence of the Lambs
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of tomato juice into a shot glass
Add a pinch of salt and 1/2 bar spoon of horseradish
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of vodka

name: Gifts from Amsterdam
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of green mint liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of passionfruit liqueur and 0.5 oz of triple sec
Light it up and quickly drink through a drinking straw

name: Texas Blaze
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of green mint liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Campari and 0.5 oz of triple sec
Light it up and quickly drink through a drinking straw

name: Porn Star
recipe: Place the pulp from 2 passionfruits and 2 bar spoons of vanilla granulated sugar into a shaker
Pour in 0.35 oz of passionfruit liqueur and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a half of a passionfruit
Top up with brut champagne into a shot glass
Eat the passionfruit, drink the shot and enjoy the cocktail

name: Last Word
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.75 oz of green chartreuse and 0.75 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer

name: Spirited Away
recipe: Place 2 ginger root wedges, 2 rosemary sprigs into a highball glass and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of green apple syrup, 0.35 oz of spiced syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with an orange wheel, a rosemary sprig and a lemon wedge

name: Devil's Kiss
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a chili pepper wheel into a shaker and muddle
Add 16 bar spoons of strawberry puree
Pour in 1 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a strawberry and a mint sprig

name: Modern Times
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.5 oz of cherry liqueur and 1.5 oz of homemade cherry rum into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Prêt-à-porter
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of honey, 0.75 oz of dry orange liqueur and 0.75 oz of cognac into a rocks glass
Add 2 dashes of orange bitters
Fill the glass to the top with ice cubes and stir
Garnish with tangerine wedges and a fan of green apple wedges on a cocktail skewer

name: Primavera
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 bar spoons of blueberry jam and a rosemary sprig into a mixing glass
Add 3 drops of red Tabasco sauce and 2 oz of silver tequila
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes and stir
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a sprig of rosemary and orange zest

name: Shine
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of Irish cream liqueur and 0.75 oz of absinthe

name: Braveheart
recipe: Place 3 chopped grapefruit wedges into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon and stir
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a grapefruit wheel

name: Sabotage
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of spiced rum
Top up with cola and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels

name: Spiced Tea
recipe: Place a wheel of lemon grass stalk into a blender and pour in 0.15 oz of sugar syrup
Blend and pour the resulting fresh puree through a sieve into a milk pitcher
Add two halves of a cinammon stick, 1 clove, 0.15 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of ginger root juice, 1 oz of honey and 5 oz of boiling water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour through the sieve into an Irish coffee glass
Add a pinch of ground nutmeg
Garnish with a lemon wedge and a stalk of lemon grass

name: The Way Ahead
recipe: Place an ice sphere into a rocks glass
Place 2 dried apricots, 2 dried plums into a mixing glass and muddle
Pour in 2 oz of dark rum and let infuse for about 1 minute
Add 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with light beer
Garnish with dried apricots and a piece of dried plum on a cocktail skewer

name: Pushkin Tini
recipe: Place a strawberry and 1/5 of a chopped rhubarb stalk into a shaker
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: The Little Bee
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of galliano and 0.35 oz of lime juice into a chilled sling glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of dark rum and dark beer to the top
Garnish with cinnamon sticks

name: The Fifth Element
recipe: Cut off the top of a grapefruit and carefully remove the pulp
Place a grapefruit wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the grapefruit
Garnish with a mint sprig

name: Squashed Frog
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of grenadine syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of green mint liqueur and 0.5 oz of advocaat

name: Paradise Punch
recipe: A litre pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Place 10 raspberries into a pitcher and muddle
Pour in 1.5 oz of lime juice, 7 oz of earl grey tea, 3.5 oz of apple juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 5 oz of coconut liqueur
Fill the pitcher with ice cubes and stir gently
Garnish with a mint sprig and 2 lime wheels

name: Rastafari
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of Campari into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of still water and 0.5 oz of absinthe
Carefully add 2 drops of sugar syrup using a drinking straw
Light it up and quickly drink through the drinking straw

name: Raul and Fidel
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.35 oz of lime juice and 0.35 oz of overproof rum

name: Raffaello
recipe: Rim a shot glass with coconut flakes
Pour 0.5 oz of vanilla syrup, 0.5 oz of coconut liqueur and 0.5 oz of Irish cream liqueur into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the shot glass

name: Re-Animator
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of sugar syrup into a shot glass
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice
Use a bar spoon to layer on few drops of red Tabasco sauce and 1 oz of vodka

name: Rocky
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 1.5 oz of orange juice, 1 oz of rhubarb liqueur and 1.5 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Barry Lyndon
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1 oz of rhubarb liqueur
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with orange zest

name: Rhubarb Sour
recipe: Place 2 red Maraschino cherries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of rhubarb liqueur and 1 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Pour into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with thin slivers of orange zest

name: Rhubarb-Toffee Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of butterscotch syrup, 0.75 oz of rhubarb liqueur and 1 oz of dark rum into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with halves of a lemon wedge

name: Red Basil Smash
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 15 Sichuan peppercorns and 10 red basil leaves into a shaker
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with lemon zest and a sprig of red basil

name: Sin City
recipe: Place 5 raspberries, a chopped kumquat into a shaker and muddle
Add 1 oz of cranberry juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: River
recipe: Place a tangerine chopped in wedges into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.75 oz of sugar syrup
Add 2 oz of vodka and stir
Garnish with a tangerine quarter

name: Rio
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of almond syrup and 2 oz of cachaca into a shaker
Add 0.5 oz of lime juice and the juice of a ginger root wedge
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a ginger root wedge and a raspberry

name: Rob Roy
recipe: Pour 1.5 oz of red vermouth and 2 oz of Scotch whisky into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with orange zest on a clothespin

name: Despicable Me
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of amaretto and 2 oz of rose vermouth
Top up with cherry juice and stir gently
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry

name: Rosemary Cooler
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 2 sprigs of rosemary and the pulp from half a passionfruit into a shaker and muddle
Pour 2 oz of pineapple juice, 0.5 oz of mango syrup and 1.5 oz of gold rum into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Garnish with a quarter of a passionfruit

name: Maid in Manhattan
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Place a rosemary sprig into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2.5 oz of orange juice, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.75 oz of mango syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a small rosemary sprig, an orange wedge and a Maraschino cherry

name: Rosemary Fizz
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Place a rosemary sprig into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 40 oz of grapefruit juice, 5 oz of honey syrup, 20 oz of mango syrup and 50 oz of vodka
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with tonic and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a peeled grapefruit wedge and a sprig of rosemary

name: Pink Gimlet
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gin into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Spray a little bit of rose water over the cocktail
Garnish with rose petals

name: Pink Ginger
recipe: Place 1 raspberry, a ginger root wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of pear vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Pink Rum
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 2.5 oz of pineapple juice and 2 oz of white rum into the glass
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with four raspberries

name: Rockefeller
recipe: Pour 2 oz of blackcurrant vodka into a shot glass
Pour 1 oz of chocolate syrup into a different shot glass and dip the dried plum on a cocktail skewer into it
Drink the shot and chase it with dried plum in syrup

name: One by One
recipe: Place a red Maraschino cherry into a chilled cocktail glass and pour in 1.25 oz of vodka
Cut a twist of orange peel and place it across the cocktail glass a little bit above the layer of vodka
Carefully place some ice cubes onto the orange zest
Pour in 1 oz of cranberry juice and top up with club soda
Turn over the zest with a drinking straw so that the cocktail is mixed, and drink it

name: The Battle of Algiers
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gold rum
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon
Top up with pineapple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a pineapple wedge

name: Rum and Coke
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of white rum
Top up with cola and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels

name: Pirate
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a ginger root wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of almond syrup, 0.75 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.75 oz of dry orange liqueur and 1.5 oz of spiced rum
Add 5 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with a red Maraschino cherry, ginger root and lime wedges

name: Django
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 5 oz of vanilla ice cream into a blender
Add 2 oz of dark rum and blend
Pour into the rocks glass
Garnish with grated chocolate

name: Rum With Orange Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of white rum
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wedge

name: Rum With Cherry Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of white rum
Top up with cherry juice and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Rum With Cranberry Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of white rum
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels

name: Rum With Apple Juice
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of white rum
Top up with apple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges on a cocktail skewer

name: Rum With Sprite
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of white rum
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with two lime wheels

name: Romantic Daiquiri
recipe: Place 2 peeled pineapple slices into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of pistachio syrup and 2 oz of spiced rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Spray peach bitters over the cocktail glass
Serve with Turkish delight

name: The Lion King
recipe: Place a peeled and chopped pineapple wheel into a blender
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of gold rum
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a rocks glass and add a pinch of ground cinnamon
Garnish with pineapple skin and a cinnamon stick

name: Rory
recipe: Place a celery stalk and 1 bar spoon of caster sugar into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 1 oz of pineapple juice and 1.5 oz of Irish whiskey
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a celery leaf and a red Maraschino cherry
Serve on a tray with an orange half, filled with raspberries and a celery leaf

name: Rossini
recipe: Place 6 bar spoons of strawberry puree into a mixing glass
Pour in 4 oz of champagne
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled flute glass

name: Requiem for a Dream
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of red vermouth
Top up with pomegranate juice and stir gently
Garnish with a small pomegranate wedge

name: Singing in the Rain
recipe: Place 6 raspberries and 4 bar spoons of redcurrant into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 2 oz of red vermouth and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a raspberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Lily Rose
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 6 bar spoons of peach puree into a shaker
Pour in 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.5 oz of rose syrup and 1.5 oz of citrus vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the highball glass
Spray rose water over the cocktail
Garnish with a rose petal

name: Royal Dreams
recipe: Rim a hurricane glass with sugar and fill to the top with ice cubes
Place 5 strawberries into a blender
Pour in 0.75 oz of strawberry syrup and blend
Pour the puree from the blender into the hurricane glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a half of strawberry on a cocktail skewer and an orange wheel

name: Lemonade Royale
recipe: Place 4 raspberries and a lime wheel into a red wine glass
Fill the red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of raspberry syrup, 0.35 oz of triple sec, 0.35 oz of Drambuie, 0.35 oz of silver tequila, 0.35 oz of white rum, 0.35 oz of gin and 0.35 oz of vodka
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with lime wheels

name: Amadeus
recipe: Place a cinnamon stick, 2 raspberries, a strawberry, a blackberry, 2 bilberries and 2 strips of orange zest into a cognac glass
Add 0.35 oz of honey and 2 oz of dark rum
Place the cognac glass onto a margarita glass and set the cocktail on fire
As the cocktail burns, keep turning the cognac glass
After 30 seconds, pour the drink into the margarita glass

name: Royal Flash
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of ginger syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of grapefruit liqueur, 0.5 oz of lemon juice and 0.5 oz of triple sec liqueur

name: Royale
recipe: Place a raspberry into a shot glass
Pour in 0.75 oz of raspberry syrup
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of vodka

name: Ruby
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.35 oz of apricot liqueur, 1 oz of orange juice and 1 oz of cognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Rouge
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of raspberry puree into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of lychee liqueur and 1.5 oz of vanilla vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Russian Long Island
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 pitted cherries, 2 raspberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of triple sec, 0.5 oz of silver tequila, 0.5 oz of white rum, 0.5 oz of gin and 0.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with 2 raspberries on a cocktail skewer

name: Russian Tea
recipe: Place 3 bar spoons of cranberries into an Irish coffee glass and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of raspberry syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Add 5 cloves
Top up with hot black tea and stir gently
Garnish with 2 cinnamon sticks

name: Russian-Japanese War
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of melon liqueur into a shot glass
Carefully place a red Maraschino cherry and pour in 0.15 oz of lemon juice
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of vodka

name: Austin Powers
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 dried plums, a chopped 1/4 of a green apple into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of maple syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky
Add 3 dashes of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest and dried plum on a cocktail skewer

name: With Fidel
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of white rum, 0.35 oz of Southern Comfort and 0.35 oz of triple sec liqueur
Garnish with a quarter of a kiwi
Drink the shot and chase it with the kiwi

name: Rebecca
recipe: Place 6 bar spoons of blueberry puree and a pinch of ground Sichuan pepper into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of blueberry liqueur and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Serve on the saucer with pieces of salers cheese

name: Sambuca
recipe: Make a hole in a napkin and insert a drinking straw
Pour 2 oz of sambuca into a cognac glass
Place several whole coffee beans into a rocks glass
Place the cognac glass onto the rocks glass and set sambuca on fire
As the sambuca burns, turn the cognac glass
In 30 seconds, pour the sambuca into the rocks glass
Place the cognac glass upside down on the napkin with a drinking straw
Drink the sambuca, eat the whole coffee beans and inhale the vapors through the drinking straw

name: Samoan Fog Cutter
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 3 oz of orange juice, 0.75 oz of almond syrup, 1 oz of fino sherry, 0.75 oz of cherry liqueur, 1 oz of gin and 1.5 oz of white rum into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Garnish with orange zest, a Maraschino cherry and pineapple leaves

name: Sangrita
recipe: A one-quart pitcher of sangrita is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Place a finely chopped cucumber and a half of celery stalk into a pitcher
Pour in 2 oz of lime juice, 10 oz of orange juice, 20 oz of tomato juice and 0.75 oz of red Tabasco sauce
Add 1 bar spoon of salt and 1 bar spoon of ground black pepper and stir gently
Garnish with a celery stalk
Pour silver tequila and sangrita into shot glasses
Drink the tequila and chase it with sangrita

name: Sangrita Carlitos
recipe: A one-quart pitcher of sangrita is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 3 oz of orange juice, 9 oz of pomegranate juice, 23 oz of watermelon juice, 1.5 oz of grenadine syrup and 1.5 oz of Worcestershire sauce into a pitcher
Add 1 bar spoon of ground black pepper and stir gently
Pour gold tequila and sangrita into shot glasses
Drink the tequila and chase it with the sangrita

name: Secret Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of Benedictine and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with small orange wedges and a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Traffic Light
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of cranberry juice and 0.35 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the first shot glass
Place the pulp from half a passionfruit into the shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.15 oz of passionfruit syrup and 0.35 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the second shot glass
Pour 0.15 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of green mint liqueur and 0.35 oz of silver tequila into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the third shot glass
Drink the green shot first, then the yellow and then the red one

name: Ferocious Bull
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of sambuca and 0.5 oz of silver tequila
Garnish with a small banana wheel

name: Northern Lights
recipe: Place a rosemary sprig into a mixing glass and muddle
Add 0.5 oz of honey and 1.5 oz of orange vodka
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 3.5 oz of champagne
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Northern Man
recipe: Pour 0.15 oz of Maraschino liqueur, 0.35 oz of cherry liqueur, 0.35 oz of dry vermouth and 0.5 oz of vodka into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of orange bitters and 0.15 oz of orange flower water
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Rim the cocktail glass with a lime wedge and garnish with lime zest

name: Ceviche Mary
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 5 oz of tomato juice, 0.75 oz of oyster sauce and 1.5 oz of homemade pepper vodka into a shaker
Add 2 drops of red Tabasco sauce, 3 drops of Worcestershire sauce, a pinch of salt and ground black pepper
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the highball glass
Garnish with a coriander sprig

name: Ceviche Chaser
recipe: A one-quart pitcher of the chaser is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Pour 2 oz of lemon juice, 25 oz of tomato juice, 3.5 oz of oyster sauce, 0.5 oz of Worcestershire sauce and 0.35 oz of red Tabasco sauce into a pitcher
Add 1 bar spoon of salt and 1 bar spoon of ground black pepper, a pinch of finely chopped coriander and stir gently
Pour gold tequila and chaser into shot glasses
Drink the tequila and chase it with the chaser

name: The Thing
recipe: Place 6 mint leaves into a highball glass
Fill the highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place the pulp of a passionfruit into a shaker
Pour in 0.75 oz of honey syrup, 0.75 oz of apricot liqueur and 1.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with mint leaves and a pineapple leaf

name: Sex on the Beach
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1.5 oz of cranberry juice, 1.4 oz of pineapple juice, 1 oz of peach liqueur and 2 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the sling glass
Garnish with a piece of pineapple and a raspberry on a cocktail skewer

name: She-Devil
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of peach juice, 1.5 oz of pineapple juice and 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with a small pineapple wedge and a pineapple leaf

name: Schindler's List
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a chopped pineapple wheel, a peeled and chopped peach half and 20 bar spoons of cranberries into a blender
Blend without ice and strain into a shaker
Add 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of peach liqueur and 2 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake carefully
Strain into the highball glass
Pour 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of honey, 1/2 bar spoon of ginger root juice, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of orange juice and 0.35 oz of still water into a soda syphon
Close the soda syphon and froth 3–4 times
Garnish the cocktail with foam from the syphon and a mint sprig

name: Sex with Pamela
recipe: Cut a triangle out of a melon and remove all the seeds
Place the pulp of a melon wedge, 2 strawberries, 4 leaves of green basil into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of grenadine syrup, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of melon liqueur and 1.5 oz of orange vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the melon
Garnish with a green basil leaf and strawberry halves

name: Celery Sour
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of pineapple juice, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of gin into a shaker
Add 5 dashes of celery bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a stripe of celery

name: Señor Sazerac
recipe: Spray a chilled rocks glass inside and outside with silver tequila
Pour 0.35 oz of agave syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila into a mixing glass
Add 2 dashes of Peychaud's bitters, 2 dashes of orange bitters and 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Serve on a saucer with orange and grapefruit zests

name: Senorita
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 3 strawberries into a shaker and muddle
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with ginger beer
Garnish with a half of strawberry and a mint sprig

name: Silver Bullet
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Carefully add a small piece of lemon
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of silver tequila

name: Silver Tequila with Lime and Salt
recipe: Pour 2 oz of silver tequila into a shot glass
Wet your hand with a lime wedge between middle and index fingers
Sprinkle this spot with salt
Lick the salt, drink the shot and chase it with the lime

name: Siberian Grog
recipe: Place 5 bar spoons of redcurrant, a cinnamon stick and one clove into an Irish coffee glass
Pour in 0.5 oz of yellow apple syrup, 0.75 oz of sloe gin and 1.5 oz of gold rum
Top up with hot assam tea and stir gently

name: Symphony
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 0.75 oz of rhubarb liqueur
Add 1.5 oz of advocaat and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Purple Haze
recipe: Place a slice of ginger root, 6 bar spoons of bilberries and a quarter of lime into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Fairy Tale
recipe: Place 1/3 of a chopped lemon grass stalk into a shaker and muddle
Place 4 bar spoons of raspberry jam
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 0.75 oz of gin
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters and 1 dash of orange bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a shot glass
Garnish with a raspberry on a lemon grass stalk

name: Skaffa
recipe: Pour 1 oz of Maraschino liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of cognac
Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters

name: Skittles
recipe: Cut off the top of a lemon and carefully remove the pulp
Place 2 strawberries into a mixing glass and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of limoncello
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Finely strain into the lemon
Garnish with the lemon top and a strawberry on a cocktail skewer

name: Slippery Nipple
recipe: Pour 1 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of Irish cream liqueur
Carefully drip a drop of grenadine syrup from a drinking straw into the center of the shot

name: Sweety
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of peach liqueur and 0.5 oz of heavy cream

name: Casablanca
recipe: Place 4 strawberries, a quarter of sweet bell pepper into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.15 oz of strawberry syrup, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of red vermouth and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a sweet bell pepper wheel

name: Wolverine
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 1.5 oz of dry vermouth and 1.5 oz of sprite
Top up with apple juice and stir gently
Garnish with three apple wedges

name: Sunset Boulevard
recipe: Pour 1 oz of heavy cream, 0.75 oz of blackcurrant syrup, 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup and 1.5 oz of сognac into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into a chilled сhampagne saucer
Garnish with a Maraschino cherry

name: Creamy Whisky
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 5 oz of vanilla ice cream into a blender
Pour in 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of heavy cream and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Blend and pour into the red wine glass
Garnish with a stick of chocolate

name: Death from Above
recipe: Place an ice cube into a rocks glass
Pour 0.15 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of Oloroso sherry, 1 oz of dark rum and 1 oz of overproof rum into a mixing glass
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and 2 dashes of orange bitters
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir gently
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange and lemon zests

name: Currant Caipirinha
recipe: Place 2 lime wedges into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.15 oz of sugar syrup and 0.75 oz of creme de cassis liqueur
Add 1.5 oz of white rum and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice

name: Currant Cosmo
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of blackcurrant, a quarter of chopped lime into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of blackcurrant syrup, 0.35 oz of triple sec liqueur and 1 oz of blackcurrant vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Squeeze orange zest over the glass
Garnish with a redcurrant sprig and berries

name: Snickers Milkshake
recipe: Place 4 bar spoons of roasted peanuts and 7 oz of vanilla ice cream into a milkshake mixer
Pour in 0.35 oz of chocolate syrup, 0.75 oz of caramel syrup and 2.5 oz of milk
Mix without without ice and pour into a milkshake sundae glass
Garnish with roasted peanuts

name: Snufkin
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of espresso, 0.35 oz of blackberry liqueur and 0.35 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of heavy cream

name: Seducer
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of Irish cream liqueur and 0.5 oz of melon liqueur

name: Warming Oriental Honey
recipe: Place a quarter of lime, an orange wedge, a grapefruit wedge and a cinnamon stick into a milk pitcher
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 3.5 oz of still water, 7 oz of orange juice, 0.75 oz of passionfruit juice, 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 2.5 oz of orange vodka
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into a teapot
Serve on a base with a candle to prevent the cocktail from cooling

name: Toy Story
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of peach liqueur
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with 5 peach wedges

name: French Soda
recipe: Place a slice of ginger root into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of gin
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled sour glass
Soak a sugar cube with blue curacao liqueur, so that the sugar cube becomes bright blue
Place an absinthe spoon with sugar cube on top of the sour glass
Pour club soda through the sugar to the top and stir gently

name: Salty Muchacha
recipe: Place 2 grapefruit wedges, 2 lime wedges and 0.75 oz of honey into a rocks glass
Add a pinch of salt and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 2 oz of silver tequila and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wheel and salt

name: Salty Dog
recipe: Rim a rocks glass with salt
Fill the rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of vodka
Top up with grapefruit juice and stir gently
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Salty Russian
recipe: Place a chopped grapefruit and lime wedges into a rocks glass
Add a pinch of salt and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of honey syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a pickle with honey

name: Bunker
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of honey syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of grapefruit liqueur and 0.5 oz of vodka
Garnish with a salted grapefruit wedge
Drink the shot and chase it with the grapefruit

name: Sunlight
recipe: Place 1 peeled and sliced banana into a blender
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 5 oz of orange juice and 1 oz of honey syrup
Add a scoop of crushed ice and blend
Pour into a collins glass
Garnish with an orange wedge and a banana wheel with a Maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer

name: Sun
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of cherry liqueur into a shot glass
Carefully lower 5 quail egg yolks into the glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of white rum

name: Malt Gold
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 2 bar spoons of crushed cookie and 1 bar spoon of cocoa powder into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of raspberry syrup, 1 oz of white vermouth and 2 oz of Scotch whisky
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Spice and Ice
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Fill halfway with spiced rum
Serve with dried fruits on a saucer

name: The Seventh Seal
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2 oz of advocaat liqueur
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lemon wedge

name: Spring Grass
recipe: Place 5 green basil leaves, 2 slices of green apple into a shaker and muddle
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of ginger syrup, 2 oz of green apple liqueur and 1.5 oz of bourbon
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges and a green basil leaf on a cocktail skewer

name: Gold Rush
recipe: Place a slice of ginger root, seeds from pomegranate wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.5 oz of sugar syrup and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a lime wedge and a Maraschino cherry with a slice of ginger root on two cocktail skewers

name: Lifestyle
recipe: Fill a hurricane glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 3 bar spoons of cherry jam into a shaker
Pour in 1.5 oz of orange juice, 1.5 oz of pineapple juice, 0.35 oz of advocaat, 0.35 oz of sambuca and 1.5 oz of gold rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the hurricane glass
Garnish with a rose petal

name: Stratosphere
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of green mint liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of sambuca and 0.35 oz of triple sec
Add 0.35 oz of lime juice
Set the shot on fire and drink quickly through a drinking straw

name: Arrow Flip
recipe: Rim a cocktail glass with granulated cane sugar
Pour 5 quail egg yolks, 0.15 oz of heavy cream, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of Pedro Ximenez sherry and 1 oz of bourbon into a shaker
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the chilled cocktail glass

name: Saturday
recipe: Place 8 pitted green grapes into a shaker and muddle
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1.5 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of yellow apple syrup, 0.35 oz of ginger syrup and 2 oz of vodka into the shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass

name: Lucky Ticket
recipe: Place an ice cube into a cocktail glass
Place 3 small pineapple wedges into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of homemade fructose syrup and 2 oz of white rum
Add 5 dashes of homemade cardamom bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a lime leaf and wrap the glass with kraft paper

name: Taiga Tea
recipe: Place 1 oz of honey, a cinnamon stick broken in halves and 1 clove into a milk pitcher
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters and 5 oz of boiling water
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Finely strain into Irish coffee glass
Add a pinch of ground nutmeg
Garnish with a lemon wedge and a mint sprig

name: Tamarita
recipe: Rim a margarita glass with ground black and red pepper
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of tamarind sauce, 1 oz of triple sec and 2 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the chilled margarita glass
Garnish with a lime wedge

name: Cockroach
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of sambuca and 0.5 oz of absinthe
Set the shot on fire and quickly drink through a drinking straw

name: Walking in Soho
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with ice cubes
Place a slice of a ginger root and the pulp of a watermelon wedge into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.75 oz of tangerine syrup, 0.5 oz of limoncello and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Add 6 peppercorns
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with ginger beer and stir gently
Garnish with a piece of watermelon

name: Fuck a Duck
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of Worcestershire sauce and 0.5 oz of lemon juice into a shot glass
Add a pinch of salt and ground black pepper and stir gently
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of vodka
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters

name: Tequila Batanga
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of gold tequila
Top up with cola and stir gently
Garnish with a small lime wedge

name: Tequila Boom
recipe: Pour 2 oz of silver tequila and 4 oz of sprite into a rocks glass
Put a napkin on the the rocks glass, cover with hand and hit the glass 3 times on the table quickly and heavily
Quickly drink the cocktail while it's foaming

name: Monte Alban
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of honey syrup, 2 oz of cherry juice and 2 oz of silver tequila
Top up with pineapple juice and stir gently
Garnish with a small finely chopped pineapple wedge on a cocktail skewer

name: Frieda
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 2.5 oz of orange juice and 1.5 oz of silver tequila
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel and cranberries

name: Tequila Sunrise
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of grenadine syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Tequila Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 1 oz of quail egg white, 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a half of lime

name: Tequila Smash
recipe: Place 5 mint leaves and 3 lemon wedges into a rocks glass and muddle
Fill the rocks glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 2 oz of silver tequila and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a lime wheel and a mint leaf

name: Bullfighter
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of apricot liqueur and 2 oz of gold tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with half of a lime wheel

name: Dark Rum and Coke
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice and 2 oz of dark rum
Top up with with cola and stir gently
Garnish with 2 lime wheels

name: Tennessee Coffee
recipe: Fill a goblet glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup, 0.35 oz of coffee liqueur and 2 oz of bourbon into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the goblet glass
Garnish with orange zest

name: Warm Apple
recipe: Place 1 bar spoon of briar and 5 oz of boiling water into a milk pitcher
Let it infuse for a few minutes and strain through a sieve
Add 5 cloves and 1star anise into the milk pitcher
Pour in 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of freshly brewed briar broth, 0.75 oz of honey syrup, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of calvados
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Garnish with a fan of apple wedges and briar

name: Tick Tock
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of green mint liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1.25 oz of sambuca

name: Tiki Margarita
recipe: Rim a champagne saucer with finely-chopped tamarind
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of almond syrup and 1 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge

name: Tiramisu
recipe: Place 2 bar spoons of mascarpone cheese into a shaker
Pour in 5 quail egg yolks, 0.25 oz of heavy cream, 1 oz of dark cacao liqueur, 0.75 oz of coffee liqueur and 1 oz of cognac
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with cocoa powder and a mint sprig

name: The Big Bluff
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 0.75 oz of grapefruit juice, 0.75 oz of cherry liqueur, 1 oz of silver tequila and 1 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into the highball glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently

name: Toddy Grog
recipe: Place finely-chopped orange and lemon quarters into an Irish coffee glass
Add a pinch of ground cinnamon and 2 cloves
Pour in 0.75 oz of grenadine syrup and 2 oz of dark rum
Top up with hot black tea and stir gently
Garnish with carambola and a mint sprig

name: Tom Yam Chaser
recipe: A one-quart pitcher of the chaser is enough to chase 20 tequila shots
Place 5 ginger root wedges, 3 chopped lemon grass stalks into a pitcher and muddle
Pour 1 oz of lime juice, 16.5 oz of coconut milk, 0.5 oz of red Tabasco sauce, 1 oz of Worcestershire sauce and 2.5 oz of soy sauce into the pitcher
Add 3 bar spoons of salt and stir gently
Pour gold tequila and chaser into shot glasses
Drink the tequila and chase with the chaser

name: Exotic Sour
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.75 oz of quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 1.5 oz of passionfruit syrup and 1.5 oz of Scotch whisky into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake thoroughly
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with half a passionfruit

name: Baby
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of yellow banana syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.35 oz of coffee liqueur, 0.35 oz of white cacao liqueur and 0.5 oz of vodka
Set the shot on fire and quickly drink through a drinking straw

name: Pan's Labyrinth
recipe: Place a Maraschino cherry into a chilled cocktail glass and pour in 0.75 oz of lychee liqueur
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 2 oz of pineapple juice, 0.75 oz of blue curacao and 1 oz of vodka into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the cocktail glass
Add a bit of crushed ice

name: Top Scoop
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 1 oz of pineapple juice, 0.15 oz of Campari, 0.35 oz of melon liqueur and 1 oz of vodka into a shaker
Add 2 dashes of grapefruit bitters
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a physalis

name: Toreador Margarita
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lime juice, 0.25 oz of sugar syrup, 0.75 oz of apricot liqueur and 1.5 oz of silver tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into a chilled champagne saucuer
Garnish with lemon, orange and lime zests

name: The Grass by the Sea
recipe: Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Place 10 mint leaves, a chopped half of lemon into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of sugar syrup, 0.5 oz of absinthe and 1 oz of vodka
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the highball glass
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with a mint sprig and a lemon wedge on a cocktail skewer

name: Trans-Siberian Express
recipe: Place a ginger root wedge, 2 bar spoons of sea buckthorn jam into a highball glass and muddle
Fill the highball glass to the top with crushed ice
Pour in 1.5 oz of vodka
Top up with orange juice and stir gently
Top up with crushed ice
Place the highball on a tea glass holder and garnish it with a sprig of rosemary and an orange wheel

name: Hot Trans-Siberian Express
recipe: Place 6 slices of ginger root into a juicer and juice
Place 4 bar spoons of sea buckthorn jam into a highball glass
Pour in 0.35 oz of lemon juice, 0.5 oz of ginger root juice, 2 oz of orange juice and 1.5 oz of cognac
Top up with boiling water and stir gently
Garnish with a sprig of rosemary and an orange wheel

name: Tropical Margarita
recipe: Fill a red wine glass to the top with ice cubes
Make a wide cut across a lemon grass stalk and several smaller cuts and lower the stalk into the glass
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of coconut liqueur and 1 oz of silver tequila
Add 1 dash of Angostura bitters
Top up with Sprite and stir gently with the lemon grass stalk

name: Coconut Lemonade
recipe: A one-quart pitcher is enough for about 4 highball glasses
Fill the pitcher 2/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place a chopped and peeled banana into a blender
Pour in 1.5 oz of coconut syrup and 8.5 oz of pineapple juice
Blend without adding ice and pour into the pitcher
Top up with club soda and stir gently
Garnish with red grapes

name: Dog.ru
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of vodka
Add 5–6 drops of red Tabasco sauce

name: Truffle Sour
recipe: Pour 3.5 oz of truffle oil over 10 quail eggs in the shell
Stir gently and let it infuse for 4-6 hours
This will be enough for 5 portions
Pour 0.35 oz of truffle oil-infused quail egg white, 1 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of Irish whiskey into a shaker
Give it a good dry shake
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake again
Strain into a sour glass
Garnish with lemon zest

name: Tundra Libre
recipe: Place 4 strawberries into a highball glass and muddle
Fill a highball glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of lychee syrup and 1.5 oz of white rum
Top up with cranberry juice and stir gently

name: Tiki Punch
recipe: A 5-quart punch bowl is enough for about 20-25 servings
Fill a punch bowl 1/3 of the way with ice cubes
Place a lemon sliced into wheels, an orange and a lime
Pour in 7 oz of lime juice, 2.5 oz of grenadine syrup, 8.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 17 oz of white rum and 17 oz of dark rum
Add 33.5 oz of orange juice, 33.5 oz of pineapple juice and stir gently

name: Briton
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of green mint liqueur into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of Scotch whisky and 0.75 oz of gin

name: Prairie Oyster
recipe: Pour 0.35 oz of tomato juice into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 5 quail egg yolks
Pour several drops of Worcestershire sauce, red Tabasco sauce and green Tabasco sauce around quail egg yolks
Add a pinch of ground black pepper
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.75 oz of vodka

name: Oyster Shooter
recipe: It is recommended to prepare 10 shots at once
Pour 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 7 oz of tomato juice, 0.35 oz of balsamic cream and 0.35 oz of red Tabasco sauce into a pitcher
Add 3 bar spoons of horseradish and 1 pinch of salt and ground black pepper
Pour in 7 oz of homemade pepper vodka and stir thoroughly
Place an oyster into a shot glass
Pour the prepared premix into it
Serve in an oyster shell with ice, a lemon wheel and a capers

name: Wakefield Triangle
recipe: Place 3 chopped rhubarb stalks into a milk pitcher and add 20 bar spoons of granulated sugar
Cook for 10 minutes while stirring
Pour into a blender and blend
Pour 9 bar spoons of the resulting rhubarb puree, 0.35 oz of lime juice and 0.5 oz of sugar syrup into a mixing glass
Add 1 vanilla pod
Fill the glass with ice cubes and stir
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Top up with champagne and stir gently
Garnish with a half of a stalk of rhubarb

name: Final Cut
recipe: Place a mango slice into a shot glass
Place a strawberry, a raspberry into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of pomegranate juice and 0.75 oz of white rum
Add a mint leaf and 1/4 of a bar spoon of granulated cane sugar
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the shot glass

name: The Secret in His Eyes
recipe: Fill a sling glass to the top with crushed ice
Place 1 chopped feijoa into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.35 oz of lime juice, 3.5 oz of apple juice, 0.35 oz of vanilla syrup and 1 oz of sugar syrup
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into the sling glass
Top up with crushed ice
Garnish with a feijoa wedge

name: Fairy Mary
recipe: Place 1 chopped feijoa, a rosemary sprig into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.35 oz of sugar syrup and 1 oz of calvados
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Garnish with a feijoa wedge and a red Maraschino cherry

name: Flag of Russia
recipe: Pour 0.5 oz of grenadine syrup into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 0.5 oz of blue curacao and 0.5 oz of vodka

name: Flirting Margarita
recipe: Fill a rocks glass to the top with ice cubes
Pour 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of passionfruit syrup, 0.5 oz of Campari and 1 oz of gold tequila into a shaker
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Top up with Sprite and stir gently
Garnish with an orange wheel

name: Foxy Lady
recipe: Place 1 strawberry into a shaker and muddle
Pour in 0.15 oz of lime juice, 0.5 oz of cranberry juice, 0.15 oz of lychee syrup and 0.5 oz of white rum
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a shot glass

name: Forrest Gump
recipe: Place 10 sorrel leaves into a mixing glass and pour in 0.15 oz of club soda
Add 1/2 bar spoon of granulated cane sugar and muddle
Pour in 0.15 oz of honey and 1.5 oz of vodka
Fill the glass with crushed ice and stir gently
Strain into a shot glass
Garnish with a raspberry dipped in honey

name: The Fast and The Furious
recipe: Pour 0.75 oz of sambuca into a shot glass
Use a bar spoon to layer on 4 drops of green Tabasco sauce, 0.75 oz of triple sec liqueur, 4 drops of red Tabasco sauce and 0.75 oz of silver tequila

name: Quantum Love
recipe: Pour in 0.75 oz of raspberry syrup
Carefully add 1 raspberry
Use a bar spoon to layer on 1 oz of white rum

name: French Guyana
recipe: Place an ice sphere into a rocks glass
Place 10 bar spoons of banana puree into a shaker
Add 0.35 oz of lime juice, 0.75 oz of spiced syrup and 1.5 oz of triple sec
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Strain into the rocks glass
Garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon

name: French Eggnog
recipe: Pour 5 quail egg yolks, 0.75 oz of honey, 2 oz of light cream, 2.5 oz of milk and 0.5 oz of cognac into a milk pitcher
Stir while heating, but do not bring to a boil
Pour into an Irish coffee glass
Garnish with cookie and dark chocolate flakes

name: French Daiquiri
recipe: Place 3 mint leaves into a shaker
Pour in 0.5 oz of lemon juice, 0.75 oz of sugar syrup and 2 oz of cognac
Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake
Finely strain into a chilled champagne saucer
Garnish with a mint leaf

name: French Dessert
recipe: Place 12 bar spoons of blackcurrant into a blender
